Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac &amp; cheese. Very spicy!

miDog7Evo5xeR5iRI3OZTg.text: The pros: Cool atmosphere, decent food, and good happy hour.   The cons: Unfortunately the bartenders at this restaurant are more distracted that a kid with ADD in the outfield of a tee ball game. In the unlikely event I ever come back here, I am going to order my drinks and then go catch a flick at Harkins.  If I stay through all the credits, they should just about be ready by the time I get back provided I walk.   The highlight of our most recent and likely final visit was after waiting 30 mins for a drink, my girlfriend ordered a house Merlot. When another patron asked the bartender what kind of wine it was he drew from his knowledge as a high level sommelier and replied "The Sh*tty Kind, haha."    This place could be great, but only after Jon Taffer comes in to smash a couple liquor bottles and berate the bartending staff to pay more attention to paying customers than their Instagram feed.

hqmESM14OP7Q7kMHa_3Q8g.text: Angel is awesome. Her customer service was amazing. I didn't have to ask for a refill the whole time.

J-knZHr-KdjtzhoqpmnoJA.text: Love this place. Great patio. Indoor/outdoor bar. Really good food. Had tri tip bites tonight yuuuuum. Really enough to split. Bartender was Angel- She's funny, attentive and quick. Nothing bad to say.

fdMIzW8RijpmHD4twnkE3A.text: Have been here twice, and both times food and service have been outstanding.  Most recently I took a friend there to celebrate her birthday.  We sat in the bar area, and Carlos was our terrific server.  He was excellent.    For a starter my friend and I shared the hot, soft pretzels with cheese dip.  Sooooo good!   For entrees, my friend had the beef medallions with fresh asparagus and mashed potatoes.  She loved it.  I had the Thai Prawns on linguini, and they were excellent.  Nice sized prawns in a slightly spicy peanut sauce.   We each enjoyed a craft cocktail and were equally impressed with taste, presentation and quality of ingredient. I had the Tennessee Honey something and my friend had the salted caramel martini. Actually, the drinks were so good we each had 2.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

OV-eTHvG2ZRaNI8YOYaoXQ.text: The first time we tried to eat here was on a Tuesday night, the wait was 45 minutes, so we decided to check it out the following week. The staff was nice, and we were seated promptly. My husband and I both got the pot pie, and it came out quickly, and it was very delicious. We couldn't get over how big the portion was. We took a slice of cheesecake home to eat later that evening, that was amazing as well.   My only complaint is there is no refill on the ice teas. We ordered a few refills and were surprised to see $14 of our bill was for iced tea. Our waiter never mentioned that refills weren't free like most restaurants do. I am sure we will be back again, and I am hoping for another good experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Delicious chicken pot pie!

NZ2VJwPtK7E5aZ4RS3aXPw.text: Great food from scratch, I had the Chicken Pot pie and a house salad which was excellent! This was my first time here and loved the food and the great beer selection! I'll definitely will be back before I leave back to Austin Texas. The bartender was very friendly and attentive to my needs. Check out this pot pie, it's quite lovely right?

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Great Chicken Pot Pie, I loved it!

wLMh13kTL6eD5iwbRvWr2Q.text: Went here for dinner with some girlfriends last night.  Probably the worst dining experience I've had.  45 minutes for appetizers, another 45 mins for food....we were there for 2 hours.  One friend's chicken was raw, 2 ordered medium burgers and they were both rare and I ordered the veggie burger, which was tasty but came out cold.  when asked if we were ok, the manager in training was rude and very unprofessional.  She blamed our waitress and the kitchen and did not own the problems.  The second manager was great....she comped our food and apologized....very nice and professional...and our waitress was wonderful.   I've been to Hop Social a few times and I will now never come back.

4Ap4ZEnBaLnObVZ71aVqYg.text: Another team builder happy hour for work! They had great happy hour specials for food and drink. The patio was cozy and the ambiance relaxing. Would definitely go here again on my own! I will say the food is half par for the cost. Would probably just stop in for a drink!

KbLjJIB5tk1BhwedDf93yw.text: Very fun atmosphere! At first I thought it was a Fox rc restaurant because of the decor/seating. The menu had quite the variety, the donuts holes are a must! The beer menu was right up my husband's alley. He had the Cuban, wasn't the best without the sauce and I had the bison burger which was very good! Service was great! We look forward to going back.

ASzyitceFtBZMiugD9Hbzw.text: 45 minutes wait at the door, however when you go on their website and make an immediate reservation through open table, the table becomes available. Strange process. Tables don't get bussed in a timely manner, so customers have to wait longer to get seated. Food is mediocre at best. Fries were cold soggy and over cooked, the salad was stale, the pizza crust was not at all what a good pizza crust should be. Same beer at other restaurants nearby are 30% less in price. First time here and very disappointed.

_2MVB6x-KHXNHKTMCpw5WA.text: This place *could* be great. The menu and food is above average and the beer selection is decent. The problem is service and operations are just awful. Based on two separate experiences seating takes forever, beers take 10 minutes to be delivered, plates show up soaking wet, food takes 40+ minutes from pad to table. Staff is working hard but lack management structure and streamlining.  Advice to management: You need to learn how to scale your ops if you're going to continue to run at 80% dating capacity. People keep coming because your food and atmosphere is better than most options but you've had enough time to get operations dialed in. Do better.

nc12ayRmpoolxrSZ32o8_Q.text: I LOVED THIS PLACE!!! I came here based on other reviews as I'm from out of town. The beer flights were extremely reasonable and our server was helpful in helping me navigate the beer menu. I ordered the artichoke pizza and it was DELICIOUS!!! Oh, the crust!!! My companions had the bacon pizza (equally amazing!) and the PB&J burger which according to them was cooked to perfection! I am planning a spring training trip around this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Hands down best pizza and amazing beer!

do0PwpACffnM-3ip1iwjYQ.text: Disappointed because we wanted to love it.   Server was upbeat and personable. She gave her opinions on some food items when we asked and we appreciated her honesty.  Beer selection is large. Not sure you are going find limited release taps here, for example. I was hoping to discover and try something new, but it was ok for what we wanted.  They brought the side salad for my husband after his burger came.  Should have come before his entree.  They forgot to make my dinner and they didn't realize it until my family was almost halfway through their meals. When the server came back to tell me it would still be a few more minutes, I told her to cancel my dinner order. Instead, I could just eat off my child's plate. I really was not upset, as my child did not like the dish much anyway and my husband said his food was nothing special so I figured we could save $15 and not waste my child's food. Then the manager came out and said she still wanted to make it. That was nice but I already said no so then I felt like I was being rude. After we were done with dinner, they made a card for my child and brought her an ice cream sundae as a special surprise. That was lovely, but I couldn't tell if that was for her or for my benefit.  Patterns in the reviews make me believe that the kitchen is the main problem. Several complaints of salads and apps coming with main courses, food being cold, etc. Our server even said "The kitchen is a mess tonight." Hmmmn.

afB5kfKqQss2RuDXf4TE7A.text: If 3.5 stars were possible, that's what this rating is. I like this place decently enough, but the food quality isn't great - it's just fine. The biggest turn off was the prices. For the quality, the prices are quite high. I'd only really want to go during happy hour.

RnpuBmHsjP6kwfACIJlw3Q.text: I absolutely love this place! Been working in AZ for 3 years now & just bought a condo up the street finally. Every time I come here Angel is a gem! She always remembers me, always asks how my day is (& means it) & just gives the overall best service ever! Always has great recommendations when I can't decide on food too. The way she runs around this bar at peak is unreal! I highly recommend this place & most importantly I recommend ordering at the bar with this lovely lady!

csw90HJoiUreisRJ1f-g9Q.text: Great food and service!! Our server was Adam and he was awesome. Make sure to check to him out in the bar area

IrW-TOpjfmz-iyGoObX4PQ.text: First time in and it was great! My hubby and I came in for late night happy hour. The bartender, Angel, was amazing! Super friendly, helpful and all around awesome! We had the buttermilk fried chicken tenders, roasted beet and Gorgonzola salad, and the Kung pao lettuce wraps. Everything tasted delicious! We will be back and next time I'll need to leave room for housemade doughnuts!

6Xg1LF3LMrfzKzn2wzqU2g.text: Best happy hour ever ! Angel and Shelby are 2 of the most talented and friendly bar tenders EVER!!! This is my go to! These gals know how to treat a customer!!XOXO!!

APlPBXnp-AdKU6pXKEF8FA.text: Our favorite place to go for happy hour! We always have to have the steak bites. They are perfectly cooked and even comes with a little salad! It is a meal for just that! All the servers including Shelby and Tiffany are so attentive and nice. My only wish is for them to extend the happy hour until 7 or extend the bar area. If you come for happy hour MUST get Homemade DONUTS!!!

ihqZFas8k965CCzGReC6xA.text: Great menu and food outstanding!  Love the array of seating options and view of kitchen. Very tasty micro brews on hand.

U6Dmtre4u6Mz6Rifous5vQ.text: AMAZING!! Huge beer selection and food is really good too! Not typical bar fare. Wide selection of dishes. Service got a 10 as well. Top that all off with the owner stopping by tables to welcome you and it's our new favorite place! We try to always support small business owners and this place is even better knowing it's owned by a couple living their dream! We will be regulars for sure!

UY_MfJeesEKR5yTsQ-VABg.text: Met some friends here for dinner on Monday. Fantastic food! Loved the unique choices on the menu. Our server was very attentive and charming. We enjoyed the fact that they specialize in Oregon beers since we're from Central Oregon. Great atmosphere!  Highly recommend!

zsEs87vPql5phYOH5vwOeQ.text: Went here for the first time and the bar staff were very friendly and helpful. I ordered a margarita wo salt. It came with salt so they were very accommodating and replaced it. What I rally liked was it was totally re made. I DO NOT like a salty margarita and usually they will just dump the salted rim margarita into a glass w/o salt which surprisingly I can taste. super glad they did not do that here! We also had the strawberry pear salad , super good and the Italian pizza. The pizza is the reason for the low number of stars. I ate a piece and mind you I was starving after playing golf all day. With every bite I kept hoping it would taste better. Like really, how do you mess up a pizza?? Well on the second piece i scraped off the toppings and the dough wasn't cooked at all I could literally stretch it like raw dough.  My husband showed it to our server and he took it off our bill after offering to remake it. That said I will be back to try it again because they handled it well and it seems like a great place.

XlVmsSEt_IyhQ6pkGBHUyA.text: Let me start by saying the food was really good, we went on a Saturday night and it was pretty busy, we ordered our food and it took 45 minutes before it came out, the waitress never refilled our waters and didn't apologize for the long wait until I brought up the issue and asked why our food was taking so long. Our food finally came out but they only brought 3 plates out of the 4, and the 4th plate was the same order as the 3rd, and it didn't come out till 5 minutes after the first 3 got to us. Just really bad service. The waitress was nice but just didn't seem to concerned about the food taking that long. The atmosphere was cool and the food was good but the service was a major disappointment.

FTYPrjiZt6R8CPks9PI20g.text: Great atmosphere, great food and awesome beer! There is something on this menu for everyone and as a transplant from Oregon I really enjoyed that they offered great Oregon craft beers as well as some great local craft beers. Can't wait to go back!

TedXgao_OdyIa3eVNw7rYw.text: We were excited to try this new place.  Great beer selection and menu.  The food was very good and loved all of the local and specialty draft beers.  We did have a couple of issues though.  First off, we were sat at a two person table that should not of been a table.  It was literally on top of the table next to us.  We were a part of their dinner.  I asked to be moved to another table and was denied.  I've never had a restaurant saw no when we asked to move.  They should not try to squeeze in this table, on top of another and in a very high traffic area.  The second issue was the length of time it took for dinner.  We we're there 30 minutes before our appetizer came and over an hour by the time dinner showed up.  All of the food we had was great, but service and the slowness of the food was unbearably slow.  We may try it again, we did enjoy it, but hopefully the figure out these delays soon.

7g-m4DJVGPNvK8GdINab-w.text: From Oregon.  Really wanted to like restaurant since from NW.  Friend who had strawberry salad said best salad EVER!  And he's old.  Two others had salmon - Scandinavian farm raised silver salmon, so not distinct flavor.  Mine was overcooked and very bland.  Other choice was sweet mustard sauce - too sweet.  Opted for sides of mashed potatoes and veg of day (NO kale), which were mushy baby reds - note to owners:  waxy potatoes should NOT be smashed because you end up with mushy mess.  Asparagus was mostly yellow and stringy... overcooked and old.  Interior stark modern with big green sofa/banquet bench in middle of room, cheap tables and chairs.  One huge open room = noisy when busy.  Have a salad or a burger, go for huge beer menu (have several I need to try), and if you want to talk, steer clear of busy times.  Lose the *&@#$% kale!!!!!

s-_hyaMZMpxAaDX331kFTg.text: I was excited about trying this new place because it had so many good reviews in yelp. I am a foodie and this fell Short of my expectations. The food was probably passable for the younger crowd but neither my daughter or I ate our dinners. The food just wasn't impressive. They were too complicated flavors. The staff was really nice, but our waitress never asked us why we basically left all our food intact and didn't ask for a doggy bag.

UGXuYncMXTxa-jLZDLJ-ug.text: We came her before a Spring Training game.  Staff was great at suggesting meals to try, since there were so many options. Environment was great, if we didn't have plans we would have stayed longer for another drink.

XsuhdK7tSnwR0pk4h05-Qg.text: So, my wife and I had been anxiously awaiting the grand opening of this new place for a while. Was excited for a new Hop Heavy beer place...This is a very hard review to give because the staff was friendly, the food was ok, and yet I find myself debating between 2 or 3 stars. The bottom line is that it feels NO different than a corporate franchise like Red Robin or Applebee's once you are inside at the bar. The beer choices were limited in the sense that you've already had everything they have to offer (only for half the price at any other bar). They have like 5 beers on Happy Hour, and those are still $5 even on HH?! The others are $7 and more. The happy hour food was ok, but nothing special. They spent months and tons of money transforming this place from the old Elephant Bar only to make it just as corporate and Blahh as every other mall bar you've been to. Please either be super unique or super cheap, you just can't have it both ways. Won't be back.

UrNaeT1IO3ZdPZJvARp5ig.text: In response to Misti's 1 star review.....I work in the service industry, and I have been involved in many new restaurant openings (NROs). There are always kinks to be worked out, and if the computer systems are down, then a smart company closes to ensure that the guest does not suffer. This is even more True with a new concept in a new area. Why would a company want a customer to come in and experience exceptionally long waits for food and drinks? The issue is out of the restaurant's hands and many customers would not understand. I went to Hop Social for dinner last night and found the professionalism, menu choices and service to be above anything I have experienced anywhere else in Chandler. The staff is so personable. My server was incredibly knowledgeable. He helped my wife decide on a beer that she loved, and I got a beer flight. We met the owner, and 2 different managers. The presentation of the food was beyond expectation.   Please do not take Misti's review as a "sign." She probably just posted out of anger because she didn't get to experience what so many of us have been able to.

RnyW2UQK3w_-xztqVX7exg.text: Food is great, staff excellent.  I personally just prefer a quieter place.

kbq2E6-xU4QB2_-3jSCxpA.text: We love Chelsea the day bartender!!! She has the best personality, so friendly and great service! We go see her at least once a week now! Great food and atmosphere

i2xbA6UeVNs15cWAbPYnMQ.text: What a great lunch! Got seated right away, server was friendly efficient and made sure we had a great time. Cesar steak salad was incredible! Will be coming back for me!

dxh9Q3GXRlqbgjPuHTrZ5Q.text: When we walked up to the entrance on 8/25 around 9PM the hostess Cat opened the door and was on point. She walked us to the table closest to the kitchen/silverware rolling station, and gave us the heads up about the table bases, which was nice. The caprese salad was awesome for starters, our entrees were the bison burger and fish & chips, which were all 12 out of 10. The service was probably the worst I've had in 10 years unfortunately. My girlfriends beer came out and was delivered from the bartender since it was dying in the well. I ordered a Mr. Pibb which arrived 5-6 minutes after the beer. A blonde young lady delivered our food and didn't say a word? Just dropped it and bolted ASAP. Who wouldn't give those entrees with ketchup or even ask if you need anything else? It was clearly after they just cut down to probably the closing servers because they were spread out all over the restaurant. She walked by us maybe 12-15 times without a glance. My empty plate was in front of me so long I set it on the silverware rolling station where it sat until after we left. Feel free to check your cameras if you have them. Zero awareness of what was happening after the dinner rush ended by everyone in the building except Cat. I told her on the way out she was the best thing that the restaurant had going, which she was blown away hearing.

cWcDkC3g_VFjov3vY4HEIA.text: We enjoyed the new restaurant Hop Social. The menu was innovative and the meatloaf exceptional. Best of all the price was very reasonable. We will be back

3xodjKDkSiBgl7b3IdDP0Q.text: The beer list is a very attractive draw, but after coming twice they didn't have the beer my husband asked for (supposedly high in demand) either time. First time I had the shrimp tacos, they were ok. Last night I had the meatloaf and not sure about you but I do not appreciate when stuff that is not listed on the menu shows up, like the crispy onions and green onion twirl, plus the meatloaf was spicy, like a hot sauce spicy.  Was not described that way. My 3 1/2yo did not like the kids mac n cheese; it was too good, too gourmet, i.e, not Kraft. They brought her chicken tenders as a replacement that she liked and we appreciated that. We don't like the tables - if you sit close to the table, your chair leg rests on the base and then you rock, so the chairs/tables aren't totally comfy. We'll probably come back again because it's an overall good place in a good location, but we'll be more discriminatory about the entree choices and maybe ask for a booth to bypass the table base issues.

NvfxtYyQW1QtWPbsyNl9xQ.text: great place and great selection of beer for the flight

3vV4SsJA8kXVsCp9pNwbsA.text: I walked in and asked if they had a gluten-free menu. I was told by the two hostess that they don't have free food. I explained I wasn't asking for a handout. The manger asked what do you want. I said it's my first time here. I haven't read the menu yet.  This was not a good start. They have no items marked as gluten free. The manger had no knowledge of the menu.  Said he had to talk to the chief who hasn't developed a gluten-free menu yet.  The manger never came back. We left.

H_p8mmENa3L_lfNdfTioxg.text: I came here with my family last night to try something new, we ordered two burgers and a chicken sandwich... The food took an hour to come out, and all three orders were wrong. I kept mine because I don't care enough to send food back (I ordered a grilled chicken sandwich with the aioli the side, it came with no sauce, bacon on the side, and entirely cold) My father had an entirely wrong entree, and my mother's food was burnt. I finished my meal and waited with them for 30 minutes until having to leave for another commitment, their food had still not arrived at this point. I later heard that my mom's food was equally as burnt as the first go round but my dad's order was all right. In the end my parents were not charged for their food, but the bill was $24 for my sandwich and a single well gin drink before tip. The drink was literally doubled the price we have seen at any other restaurant.  They have a wide beer selection which is nice, I wish they offered sours though. If you are going out to drink then this is probably your place, but spending over 2 hours for bad food is definitely not worth it.

uXN5zkNP4N2kuOcz87uUIQ.text: One of my favorite places for SO many reasons! They have an awesome happy hour 7 days a week from 3-6pm. They have appetizers and small plates that are anywhere from about $4-7 and they are all really good portion sizes for the prices. I love ordering one or two as a meal!  The pretzels and beer cheese and fish tacos (pictured) are my favorite. Surprisingly, they make great sushi as well. They have a plethora of beer and wine selections and the $5 happy hour margaritas are always great. Beware, though, that happy hour is only served in the bar area.  Hop Social is always consistent in both flavor of food and service. The staff is always very friendly and service is quick. Their outdoor seating area is a great place to enjoy your meal.  Would definitely recommend, especially if you're looking for a weekend happy hour.

7HgRr474pR_F7hKfTjyOOw.text: What a great spot, some how we've forgot about this place after it got redone...but they've done an amazing job making this place super trendy and hip. Great for date night, lunch, dinner or happy hour. They have an amazing happy hour menu as well. We had several items on the menu and everything was amazing! Will definitely need to come back and bring some friends!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

jMZhZ1Sv4ZxXb2H5nLt_sQ.text: Great atmosphere, amazing food and drinks!  We were there for our first visit on a Saturday and they had happy hour from 3-6pm on a SATURDAY!  Angel, our bartender was awesome!  Great conversation and service.  Definitely looking forward to going back!

arN6TAqd4RyiS7OtiylAtA.text: Why did I wait so long to come back here!?  I first came here during their soft opening and really enjoyed the food.  So when my friend suggested another restaurant in the area, I suggested we go to Hop Social since she had never been.  We looked at the menu and decided to split the Strawberry Pear Apple Salad and the BBQ Bacon Cheeseburger.  When ordering we told the waitress that we were going to split the meals.  Now normally this means that we get extra plates.  We we received our meals they were actually split in half.  Each of us received a plate with half a burger and some fries, and a small salad in a bowl (which looked beautiful!).    Our waitress was friendly, checked up on us regularly and our glasses were never empty!  I'm not going to wait so long to go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Strawberry, Apple, Pear Salad
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. We asked to split the burger
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. These mash potatoes were so beautiful,  they tasted even better

F0Bo5bB3s3PYGU-sK1oBhQ.text: This place is awesome!! Happy hour is every day 3-6 with so many options on happy hour. Our table got the chicken tenderloins, fish tacos, pretzel, Brussels sprouts and spinach dip and everything was absolutely delicious. Drinks are reasonably priced too. Our server Jordan was awesome and checked on us often to make sure everything was good. We will definitely be back

jmyU-OG6KMnzsZ5JnSrDHg.text: Hop Social is a great addition to the Chandler Fashion Mall area.  The menu is diverse and the food was all very good.  The layout was very hip with plenty of couches mixed with tables for those preferring a more traditional seating.  The bar area was nice but a little tight on seating.  There was an outdoor area that would be great between October and April.    Service was solid and the prices were fair.  I had a buffalo burger and it was cooked perfectly and was very filling.  I will definitely be going back and keeping an eye out for special tasting events.

UCVc8XsuEw0irouT5RRR2g.text: I absolutely loved this place!  I am out of town & stumbles up this place. The happy hour is amazing and the food is killer for the prices. I'd move here just for their Hppy hour and amazing food!  The service was the best I've had. My bartender Sara told me she was new but she was not only sweet but super knowledge in recommending food and drinks!

dFv58AjV1H7JIGA8cLyggQ.text: Was trying to decide between Firebirds next door and here. The wait at Firebirds was going to be 10 min even for one seat, so I walked over to Hop Social Tavern. I was super hungry because I hadn't eaten all day, so I was happy when they seated me right away.  Rosie my server was prompt and super cool. I ordered a glass of wine and fries to start which came out right away. Some of the fries were a little soft, but some were crispy, but I didn't really care because I was so hungry. Got the steak salad, changed the dressing to the lemon vinaigrette. The steak was pretty thin medallions with a great smoky flavor, it was as medium rare/rare as I would've liked it, but I think it would've been difficult to achieve based in the thin cuts. Overall, it was really and the crispy Brussel sprouts were a nice bonus.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

kRa5RM8iwa4IUNlAMOQCTQ.text: I continue to come mostly on the weekends when the crowds aren't so bad & for the vibe (when it suits me). I haven't found a 'go to dish' and I've had a lot, hence the 3.5 rating as the food has yet to take me over the hump (vs the price point).

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

0FMG4-j53ujLsy6DuU6IAA.text: First visit: I had one of the best margherita pizzas I have had in a while. Loved the atmosphere and all the TVs.  Second visit: I talked up this place to a friend and we decided to try out their happy hour specials. They seated us in the regular dining area, and we didn't think much of it. Then we ordered solely from the happy hour menu but did not directly tell the waitress "hey, we are ordering from the happy hour menu" because I have never had to do that anywhere else. Then the check came back and nothing was happy hour price. They told us we had to sit in the other area to get happy hour and that the plates we were given were regular dining size plates not happy hour plates so they had to be charged full price. We were a little annoyed but we understood and paid and left.  They should definitely be more clear about happy hour rules. If you see us ordering solely from the happy hour menu, how about you mention this stuff? They have great happy hour specials and I think people would enjoy them but I recommend you make sure to ask your server exactly what you have to do in order to get the happy hour specials.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Margherita pizza and atmosphere

EfR4QSub1qvWnvcJJ2qO-Q.text: Came here with a group of 8 - were seated quickly & all had a good time   Extensive beer selection  Wide variety menu to please large groups   The appetizer nachos are HUGE. Absolutely delicious. So much meat, cheese, cilantro, and general heavenliness.

xFHw7vFpXegTNrPslwwJAw.text: Monday night and they are 3/4 capacity.  Sat at the bar and got served quickly.   Really nice wine selection for a hop tavern.   Selected a William Hill cab.  I know that winery well...see pic from the day after the Atlas Peak!  Selected the Cab Tips.   WELL, that was great!  Tender chunks of fillet in a wine sauce with creamy mashed and asparagus.  Come on, it's only Monday!  I'm in town all week and I will be back for an other selection.  Can't try them all this trip...but hey, there's no rush.  Come here!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Cool bar effects!

6nlBs-Jb0p6vzrV_xVbK3w.text: Had my niece in town and wanted to try some new food that she wouldn't have in her hometown, so her chose HopSocial because of their reviews. Once we got there, I was afraid the atmosphere would be too rowdy or too loud for my 9 month old, but I was mistaken. The customer service was great, the atmosphere was decent for a bar/restaurant, and the food was delightful. I ordered a strawberry apple salad, my niece ordered their fish and chips, my 9-month old loved her own little platter of mashed potatoes & my other half got a burger (of course) We were all satisfied and stuffed to the brim =) Happy family

MBzjv3oGbUkLuzMLpTzR6g.text: Enjoyable Happy Hour. Will definitely be back. Not crazy about the drink prices but the food prices for happy hour were legit. All and all will continue to visit this spot. My husband like the upscale drinks. Next time I come will be soley for dinner so hopefully we can try some new grub.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Donuts
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Whiskey sunset

vowwlyGr4HcnK6vmMLPrlg.text: I was pretty excited to try this place after reading the reviews.  It was just A-ok.   Maybe I ordered the wrong entree but it was one of their specialities.  I decided to go with the fish tacos and I was underwhelmed. Had a reservation and we were sat on high top table near the kitchen.  I expected since we had reservation we should end up with a booth.   I did read other reviews that the pizza is good and other entrees.  I might give them one more try maybe when they are not soooo crowded.

H7w758FMyl0uPzD_svBUcw.text: We love hop social Tavern! They're happy hour is absolutely the best. They have amazing cocktails and the happy hour menu has a lot of phenomenal items that aren't on the regular menu. Besides Cooper (he's the best bar tender,)The service is decent, but just get the donuts and nothing else matters.  We also love Angel, Sara, Ty, and Tyler!!!

ITpd8BErmEoAe55e-_mBdw.text: Came for Father's Day and we were not disappointed! We enjoyed excellent cod tacos and a bison burger. Their food is amazing! You need to go here. We want to go back and try other offerings!

1npICToEB-E8OqJNOuBjYA.text: We love going to Hop Social! The menu has a wide variety and the food is amazing, they have great happy hour prices too. The ambiance and decor is great as well. We have no complaints :)

xKw1MqKqa0V0bgEI7pVh0Q.text: Tried this place out for the first time. The food was delicious (chicken Marsala )and our server was awesome ( I believe he said his name was Adam ). The only down fall of the experience was, that the food took super long. Prices were reasonable, but I was hoping for a better happy hour special. Which I think was a reverse happy hour 9-close if I'm not mistaken. Overall I would come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Chicken Marsala over red mashed potatoes and a side of asparagus.

Iw4IhfRqxwlFfDnzLUbOaA.text: My wife and I joined a friend for happy hour. Emma had their fish tacos, our friend had the sweet chicken tenderoins and I had the crispy chicken tenderloins. All three meals tasted great and we had excellent services. We qereca bit disappointed with the margaritas however.  They were packed with ice, lots of ice and very very little Tequila. We'll definitely give them another try in the future but they need to do a better job on their drinks.

8S06m4xabqaM_JzoWAQBNA.text: This is a brand new bar/restaurant..it's 5 stars because somebody really knows how to hire. Inside ,outside ,more inside ,more outside seating., fire pits, couches..first class build out..could be best in this area. Full size wrap around bar and most importantly standing bars for when it's crowded. The sound system and ceiling noise dampeners are well done. Great sound , loud but not too loud..full sound. Wonderful employees. They are really assembling a great group. Be patient, it's a new place with new people, let them work the kinks out..sheesh. Order your drink or food and just chillLevi, Chelsea..thanks for the effort to answer our many ??. Beer choices are many, some are great. 52 craft beers. Glasses need to be cold for every pour, not just when it's slow. The prices are excellent for the food amount. The bacon wrapped meatloaf was excellent, real potatoes were mashed. The gravy..tasty but just not sure where it is going. Either it needs to be tomato based or gravy or just something else...a real winner though..ended with donuts..delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Sitting at the bar
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

VCZgbTeygcu9JNikUdpH-A.text: My wife and I tried hop in Chandler for the first time.  We had a great time and enjoy good food as well as a delightful bartender named Angel. It is a well run/managed establishment with a great environment.  Thanks Angle,  Chris and Lynn

zCq8cgioZE-3fEMnbJQpww.text: Great new place to have a drink with some friends. I recommend going in early it can fill up fast.

SNhIPtjzc81BkM518xnMAg.text: First time here. Recommended by people from work. Great service and all five of us had an excellent meal. I had king pao Chicken. Very tasty. A couple had the meatloaf and they raved about it. Never saw a fancier plate of meatloaf. Looked amazing. And one had stuffed salmon which also got a big thumbs up. Also loved the huge draft beer selection. Definitely coming back again.

iLapXKKzcnoPYEF1wTL6UA.text: We have been here for happy hour many times and always had a good experience. We went last night at 5:00 and the bar was packed so sat at a table just on the other side of the wall from the bar. Ordered the house wine thinking would be getting HH prices since HH lasts until 6. We were very disappointed to hear they only do HH pricing in the bar. Most restaurants in the area - especially since Hop Social has the open concept - offers HH pricing no matter where you sit. The bar is very small and with the summer coming, the outside patio will not be doable, so unless you are one of the lucky few who actually gets a table in the bar, will have to pay full price during HH. There are many other options in the area - Tres Tempe, TPM, Good Times Charli's - that do offer HH to all patrons so unless Hop Social changes their  policies, will not be going there again.

gqYco-y-X8VcI-srPZ7Lsw.text: Love this restaurant. Great design, atmosphere, variety of seating options, and most importantly food. We ordered the mushroom pizza and buttermilk chicken salad last visit. Both will be enjoyed again very soon!

JMzF1gft8CZxCEaq5u_WnQ.text: The food was just average.  I had the fish tacos with very tiny pieces of fish.  My husbands fish and chips were okay.  The worst part was the noise!  Even at 4:00 we couldn't even hold a conversation.  The party next to us was over served , loud and very obnoxious.  We won't be back.

CBZqYl9bBHKbkgWT1ENOdA.text: I've been here twice since it opened, and both times have been great! The entire staff is friendly and goes above and beyond to welcome you. There are plenty of seating options, and the way it's set up is very trendy and modern. There are tons of options for beer, food, and cocktails. Everyone on staff seems to like being there and want to see this new restaurant succeed. Our first visit in, the owner himself came to talk about the menu and his restaurant. I will definitely be coming back to enjoy the atmosphere and food Hop Social offers.

7gFYzkDKkJpOCs-kpCQigw.text: In town enjoying the warm weather for my Birthday weekend. Could not be happier that we stumbled across Hop Social on Yelp and took the leap of faith! Amazing patio, food, drinks and the donuts!!! Great social scene to boot. Go, you will love it!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

1HpbYYvydCO3knkBNurZYA.text: So my wife and I have been to Hop Social 4 times now, and apparently we're in the minority here as we love the place. Have had no food issues, server issues or beer issues. In fact our servers have all been pretty excellent. The owners stop by the tables to see how everything, which is pretty classy.   I would agree that it's loud inside, but we sit outside. The happy hour menu is pretty good I'd say having had the steak bites chicken tenders, corn fritters, and donuts. Last night we split the meatloaf and it was pretty bomb, I mean the thing is wrapped in bacon.  Beer selection is excellent with the Rogue Cold Brew IPA being my favorite.   I'm searching for something to knock them for but I got nothing. I think people just need to give them a chance to hit their stride.  I'm hoping they do well especially with the ruining the remodel at Whole Foods has done with their bar and smoke house.

jNPmUr5b1GpfYI6ymsK7XA.text: This one of my favorite places to go in Chandler. Great atmosphere excellent food, Angel and Shelby...our bartenders were friendly and helpful. I strongly recommend that you get the PB&j burger ...it is out of this world!!!

80BAbb7nSOYfuCZL72rOhA.text: I. Love. Hop. Social. Tavern. There is STELLAR choice of beer. They have so many beers on tap. Angel is the best bartender I have ever had the pleasure of being served by. She turns bartending into an art form. Even IF this place was trash I would return for her alone. Luckily this place is really great and so is she!!

Lk-e83bJLCLWh0ha23C6gA.text: I love this place!  Food is always freshly prepared with great ingredients and tastes.   Their meatloaf is amazing and with everything from burgers to seafood, everyone has a variety to choose from.  Service is great and beer choices are plentiful!  Everything you could ask for!  Their homemade donuts with caramel sauce on the side are absolutely magic!!!!  Gotta have 'em!!!

vjfgo7aoDMMHNgk-wlbtEA.text: Great food, fast service, and tasty beer. I was most impressed that the manager not only brought my husband free desert on his birthday, but a card signed by the staff. Great customer service!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

vN5pbpwbqmvgnXjv8u_YeQ.text: Second time visiting.  First time was for a happy hour and today was lunch with co-workers. Ahi Poke is yummy. Ginger on the side was the best I ever tasted, I could have had a bowl of that stuff! Fish tacos are below average (I would suggest a better sauce). I received the same slow service both times I have come here, slow service from both the wait staff and the kitchen.  I get that this is a scratch kitchen, but a work lunch should not take 2 hours. I think this place has a great shot at being a local favorite if they improve their service.

uDsHmdhfJtuznzXl-0bU7Q.text: Glad we stopped in. Waiter was nice and helpful.  Steak salad was yummy and different. The lemon caesar dressing was a good change. Friend had peanut butter/jelly burger and loves it. Fries weren't great though, need to work on those a little.  We'll be back.

lLxtfCpnterYR5zU6wW2yA.text: Our waiter was very odd... Food was just okay. Has like 4 hostesses and only 1 doing anything! Bartender was nice and the little patio with fire pit was cute! I don't feel the need to go back.

tD5L59WDzbbgOjtPgcI7nQ.text: Came in last night to enjoy Happy Hour and have a nice dinner with friends.  The drinks and appetizers were perfect and the additions to the happy hour menu provided plenty of choices. Transitioning to dinner was nice and there are plenty of great entrees to choose from.  One thing I pay attention to is the service and we were routinely checked in on by our server and the floor manager.  Everyone in our party felt like the customer service was outstanding and the food and drinks met the challenge. We will definitely be back to sample other drinks and food items.  This is a place that is good for small groups or large groups. Great for appetizers or full meals.  It nice to have a place so close by to have a good night out any day of the week.  Atmosphere is good and the volume level is perfect to have a nice conversation with the table without having to yell. Will be my go to place for sure!!

z6iERccc0AzMUOCVJxk_Jw.text: Love the menu, love the atmosphere,  and the beer selection. Have tried many things. Veggie burger is my fave. And the chicken pot pie...yum.

fwlAPCC69Wind2K4r-gJVw.text: If you want pages of options, this is the place for you...  Cool decor... Lively atmosphere during peek times...

uHzXmwKXauLvGo3os3qspA.text: A last minute decision for NYE dinner.....GREAT FIND.   They have only been here 5 weeks. The pot pie was awesome....bacon-wrapped meatloaf....yup awesome! Our friends had the ribs and tenderloin tips....everyone was happy.  We also had a couple apps.  This place has a great atmosphere; decor is modern. Can't wait to come back!!

SBKEsnrXGGMJvNZe1Ng67w.text: I thought this place was good and had a great atmosphere the first time i went however the second time was a totally opposite experience. I went with a friend on Father's Day and was told the wait would be 25 min waited about 10 min and was seated, so i thought i was in for a good time. So our waitress comes over and asks what we would like to drink we got water initially because we were still looking at the drink menu. I kid you not the waitress, Ariel, was serving a table right behind us with 8 people, and she didn't take our drink orders for another 20 min. Once i finally got her attention she asked what we wanted. My friend ordered a 16 oz beer and i sprang for the larger size while advising the waitress I'm not sure when I'll see you again so I'll take the larger size. The waitress immediately got defensive rolled her eyes and said i said sorry like 20 thousand times. So i proceeded to ask for a manager. The manager comes over and offers us a comped appetizer. We refused the food and finished our beers hesitantly hoping our drinks were not tampered with. It's safe to say i will never be back again!!

3X2tWF_aUGrFkWWJtYsh1w.text: Sat at th bar, had a couple of great beers and probably the best steak salad I've ever had!   They have over 50 beers on tap- how awesome is that?!  Our bartender was Angel and she was super friendly. I will be back!

Vm4uVgnRDJTgCLje7KugDg.text: Wonderful atmosphere! We had the turkey club and cheeseburger which were good and tasty but you MUST HAVE THE SCRATCH MADE DONUTS! Served hot and with a caramel sauce.....so so good!! Welcome to Arizona Hop Social...we will certainly be back!

zMgK9D8EbuShCt5oex_1vw.text: We stopped in out of the blue and are so thankful we did! It might be our new favorite! The buttermilk chicken tenders are the best I've ever had. The banh mi was delicious, and so was the Mac n cheese.

e-vumqYG9dXylwBHn0YZIA.text: The food was good. I enjoyed the atmosphere and it's a nice place. The customer service is what knocked stars off. When we first arrived we were greeted by a hostess who was kind and let us know happy hour was in the bar area only. When we got up to the bar, it was packed! One of the only tables open inside was dirty, so my fiance kindly asked a waitress (standing right next to us) if they could have it cleaned.. mind you she was busy, so he even acknowledged the fact she was busy and asked once she finished if she could please ask someone to clean the table. The waitress looked at him and didn't even say a word and turned back around. Like really? We were kinda shocked that she literally worked there and didn't have the decency to say a word. Someone ended up cleaning our table right after and we ate our food. We didn't get water refilled or barely checked on. I just wish our first experience was better because we would've returned, we love places like this! But the customer services sucks! Manager didn't care either when we made him aware of the situation, after we finished, paid and we're about to leave. Didn't bother to ask who we were referring to either.

kxgbu8sPFvohJJUGVO_htQ.text: Great food. Management and all staff was very welcoming and super friendly. Menu is diverse. Great drink list as well. Highly recommend this place. Husband wife owners too!!

KcHgXlGNvKgv0_cxGCFT-g.text: It pains me to write a bad review, because I had such high hopes for this place.  We went to Hop Social the first weekend it opened.  My husband and I put in a food order and never received any food after waiting a hour and a half.  Tonight we went again to give it another try.  We were seated right away and then waited for 15 minutes to get water because the hosted seated us in a place that wasn't covered by wait staff.  We put in a food order and waited, and waited and waited.  My husband and child's food was sitting under a warmer for 20 minutes before it came out, because my pizza took so long.  The kung pow chicken was cold, blah and was some chicken and rice.  Thats it.  I ordered the forest mushroom pizza...and it came out with no mushrooms!!!  When we finally were able to tell a manager, they put in a new order and comped both pizzas.  But really, too little, too late.  We will not be giving Hop Social a third chance and I'm really bummed by that.

9F4NfgQNTwdH5TL5q3I6fg.text: If I could give a negative star I would. Ordered the salmon and after the second bite I realized it was spoiled. My husband being brave decided to try it, he was smart and spit it out. Poor waitress when she told the manager we watched him smell it and nod. Sent her back to tell us they won't charge us for it! REALLY!? You served a customer bad fish and the manager doesn't even come over to apologize. No offer to get us something else (which we would have declined as now all I can think about is the night ahead with food poisoning). Nothing we had was worth the trip. The poke tuna appetizer was a huge mound of rice with a little ahi (in retrospect probably a blessing knowing the quality of fish). It came with a small over cooked piece of wonton when we asked for more the waitress came back with two little broken pieces and said "if you need the cook can make some fresh ones" REALLY why would you not start with fresh ones!?  The menu is all over the place from wood fire pizzas, stir fry, tacos, burgers, steaks, pastas pot pie and meatloaf it makes no sense.  Figure out what you do well (not the fish obviously) but quality and do it right. This place will never last! Don't waste your time go to Maerles or Firebird next door, you won't get food poisoning.

hqk5z6zOMTwXHP22Gl5vXg.text: Sat in the bar area took a while for anyone to come over or even acknowledge not even that busy. Plenty of the staff & managers just kept walking by.  Finally getting ready to leave a server came and said has anybody been to you yet not even a greeting. In haven't been here before  wanted to know about some items too much in hurry or just didn't care say a little of both. Ordered the blackened chicken pasta friend had roast beef sandwich. The blackened chicken was way way too spicy overwhelming plan pasta no feta a couple leafs of spinach a bad dish. I let the server know when we could find her asked another server for ketchup that didn't happen I asked that server again she was to busy now running food, but we have semi hot food now, OMG really. Are server came finally came over told her about the over spiced chicken not good wanted to order something else ask about fish tacos she told me has some spice I didn't want any. Came out the same way as the chicken spice couldn't believe it didn't eat, such a waste of time & money. We weren't the only ones saying the same, ya think they would fixed.  First time and last time will go here. Staff with no care, friendly attitude. No Thanks

KnutvgxTXu1a3sNpP4BhZA.text: All the food was well made and quite tasty. I enjoy the red sangria. Fun environment too.

hMgptecEhnIxhu7CUkmY-g.text: Did not get greeted in the bar for over 25 mins after happy hour started. Great food but we had to find a pitcher of water ourselves. The Mac and cheese was great and the donuts are bomb but please be mindful of our time we had a movie to go to that we had to move back.

hlMNEmQNQpn-Zqtt_U52lw.text: The food is awesome! The service? Meh. I'll gladly wait for 'from-scratch' food, but if that's your model, then be on-the-spot with drink service. My water wasn't filled once and refills on other drinks were super slow. Plus our waiter didn't check on us after the appetizer was delivered.

qEB53b_TwFUta2Xx3XQ81w.text: This place is so fun! We live nearby and noticed how busy it always seemed after opening, so had to stop by and try it out. The decor is a funky, retro industrial and the inside is a huge, open concept floorplan. They have a huge food & drink menu. Would definitely eat here again

Er5t3dSvxLFmCCeRfMBB6w.text: I was here on a not so busy Thursday night.  We sat in the bar area and had drinks and asked for a dinner menu.  I told the server we were going to order dinner and he gave us menus.  He delivered the drinks  and then ignored us for 45 minutes.  He walked by me 10 times (I counted) and I even tried to wave him down.  I actually timed it.... which I never do.  I finally had to walk up to him and get my check.  When I filled out a comment card, there was no one at the hostess stand for quite some time.   An employee there for a personal function took my comment card and apologized. I went next door and had a great experience at Firebirds .

dj0J4JRqOGGRSnYTvy1GUw.text: Great service the moment you walk through the door! Management is always on patrol making sure that you're experience is pleasant. Their menu has anything you may want and they do it all well. Great happy hour, maybe the best in town! Keep up the good work!

nifmUdv94EZWLzhzFTG5Gw.text: I was excited to try this place after hearing great things, but at as another reviewer said, it fell short of my expectations. First of all, the wait time to get our food was borderline absurd considering the restaurant was far from busy. It took about 20 minutes for a starter salad and about 40 minutes for a salad and burger. The side for the burger was delayed too. One of the items came out wrong and while we kept it anyways (we were super hungry after the long wait) there was no offer to remake or a discount on our check. As someone who comes from the restaurant industry, that was disappointing. Contrary to other posts though, I did think the food was good. And the staff was nice.

iInOjbDpU99vm6pnw6Ks9A.text: I honestly wanted to like this place - 3 stars is probably generous. After two visits, I have some solid complaints about the food and the customer service.   First of all, it's really loud. Even after the noise dampeners it's still difficult to hear the people at your table. Secondly, it's freezing in this place. Second visit and still ridiculously cold.   The food overall is pretty tasty. The corn fritters were dry and the sauce is way too sweet. We've been twice and had the orange chicken (pretty solid, small portion for the cost), chicken sandwich (pass - it's nothing to write home about and mine was incredibly salty), the Mac and cheese (probably the best thing we had here period. Would recommend), and the steak salad (pretty good but borderline salty again and difficult to eat).   The servers, while nice, are not attentive enough. Additionally, my biggest complaints are the fact that all the food came out together - the cup of soup, appetizer and all the entrees. Huge pet peeve of mine. When our entrees came out, my steak salad was ice cold and had clearly been sitting for a WHILE. The restaurant remade it warm but no apology was made and no alteration to the bill. My husband was done with his pasta before my remade meal even arrived.   Overall, I think it's still a work in progress. Potential but I'd like to see a lot of these things change before coming back - especially for the price point.

nYD1JqRl7HUj__IuDbI3pw.text: The servers here are so friendly and helpful! Ericka is amazing!! She was attentive and made great conversation and recommendations. Ericka made it a point to remember what 5 beers I wanted to try for the flight and she got it right without writing it down!! The food is fantastic!! I absolutely love that everything is made from scratch. Even though it was busy tonight, everyone made an extra effort to bring us free chocolate covered strawberries and donuts! The beer here is so awesome! There are so many selections; much more than other local taverns in the area. I loved the flight of 5 so I could try 5 different beers and the prices are very reasonable. Overall, I would highly recommend this place and will definitely be back soon!!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Beer flight!! Amazzzzing and afforable!!!!
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. The Orange chicken was soooooo good!!

DjTAFKOCmZ_ps9jGx0y3sA.text: Great stuff. Tried a flight and enjoyed each beer. Price might seem a bit high but then again I would have to try this another time or two and see how the portions are. We sampled appetizers and enjoyed the nachos and thought the Ahi Tuna was ok.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Front side of menu

GmlcSxrS7JH-9QLDgnB-cw.text: I love the decor, very trendy! Open space throughout and a nice patio section. TVs with good music in the background. I enjoyed the tenderloin tips entree it was sooo good. Came with mashed potatoes and asparagus. Seasoned just right with not too much salt. Know what else?? THE DONUTS! With my chocolate porter! Our server was pleasant, knowledgeable, and the staff in our table area were super helpful.  Prices are pretty reasonable too, I can't wait to go back for happy hour!

30n1XQHydKZX--P5KYREAw.text: Nice place when you walk in. I had the chicken sandwich. The chicken tasted like a boiled mushy rubbery mess. For $16.99 you think it's grilled and freshly prepared. Bun was great until it got soggy from the boiled chicken. The sauce wasn't that bad on the sandwich. I would say McDonald's has better chicken I think I'll stick with the 5 dollar deal.

UhGPxwcJ4hqY6qWpDr1pzw.text: I have dined at this restaurant three times, while the food was pretty good the service could use some attention. All three dining experiences were after 1pm so maybe the staff was tired from the lunch rush?  From sitting down to paying the bill our meal took a little over an hour - if you are not on a schedule or trying to kill some time then this is the place for you.

dZeWGT8HvbV196g-JOA4Yw.text: Great Food with Amazing Service! Why this is 3 stars I have no clue but keep it that way, if it's another hidden gem in Chandler I'll take it!

W5J5zjoI15qucylZ46E1Bw.text: My sister and I decided to come here after a long day of travel for a quick bite. Two hours later we left super satisfied and ready for a plan to go again. The food was very good and the cocktails were delicious. The bartender was so sweet and attentive. She was training someone and was so good and educating her how to give the customers a great experience, but was always attentive to us. Will become my go to place.

g18Ov88ItNUm7_9gVCvjOw.text: Busy and seemingly popular place on a Friday night.  The Bison Burger was good, and they have a large selection of beers on tap (over 50), which is great.  I sat at the bar, and the service was ok considering how busy they were.  TV setup at the bar was good, and they had a variety of games on. I don't live in the area, but I had this place bookmarked so I decided to take a drive and check it out.  I'm glad I did.  I would and probably will return.

V8xJeDcaU9ROvE1Q8n5bfQ.text: Wow!  What a great new hotspot for the Tempe/East Valley area.  Fun atmosphere with plenty of good conversation accompanied by tasty food and a wide verity of drinks to choose from.

wxitDYTrXKqxnddrB-7aMQ.text: The food is amazing here but the pricing is a bit high for what you get!  My personal favorite here is the Cuban sandwich. Highly recommend it when eating here.

PuPh6CPVdWiFTEJq4sYfyw.text: We had the pleasure of dining here within the first week they were open.  We were greeted with the doors being opened for us and energetic smiles.  We were seated near the kitchen, so got to see the magic happening.  I personally am not a fan of the high top tables as my legs dangled and went numb, but there are several other seating options available that we will choose next time.  The staff is very lively and energetic, constantly in motion.  The greatest experience was meeting, and being welcomed by the owners, David and Christie.  They talked to us for quite some time and we were very impressed with them.  The food was absolutely delicious and was served quickly.  My husband had the meatloaf and I had a cheeseburger.  It was awesome being remembered as we left, Christie shook our hands again and called us by name.  It was definitely a very enjoyable experience and we will be back!

UOU106YRCcOP7P4W0kMlxA.text: Cute restaurant inside with nice ambiance and TVs for sports! Kale salad and chicken Marsala were delicious. Friendly staff as well.... Chandler needs more places like this!!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Chicken Marsala split.... soooo good!

lT5VxXcvnQ-wGqtqHiyi1Q.text: Went back to the Hop Social to try it again after not going since it opened. The reason they are getting the 4 stars  are is for my SERVICE. My waitress was Amazing ( Halona ) she was on top of it, with suggestions to all of my questions. Also , she saw my pizza wasn't exactly what it should be she got the manager to address it immediately.  Fist, my pizza was the heirloom margarita pizza , but as you'll see in the pic it had whole cherry tomatoes on it cut in Half. I found out later they were out. The manager did remove it from the bill so , I appreciate that. Other than that I would not get the pizza again.  My daughter got the Grilled Chicken sandwich , she said it was amazing !  Last but not least was the appetizer, we got the pretzels and cheese to start ( yes was a carb overload day,lol )  They were so good , they were soft and they didn't skimp on the cheese. For once I had extra cheese when I finished!

SFmS7WRiYhE8pskuybCpSg.text: Great atmosphere. I love any place with outdoor seating.  Has heaters and misters- which is great for keeping your comfortable outside.  Had the strawberry/pear salad with arugula. I didn't really look close enough when I ordered... not a huge fan of arugula- but still refreshingly light.  Large drink menu- can get flight of 5 beers for $9.00.   Server friendly.

B8uqka01rWexRb4tX-dZcg.text: What a great place to go for some great happy hour drinks and food. The portions sizes were perfect. Definitely would recommend picking different items and sharing. The steak bits were definitely hands down my favorite dish. Very tasty and cooked perfectly. I would recommend you not to modify your preference on the temp of the steak. For someone who doesn't eat steak due to braces it was tender soft juicy and melted in my mouth that's how amazing that dish was. If you like sushi it was very delicious. The service was great as well are waiter I believe his name was Trevor checked up on us but made sure we were taken care of. The rest of the staff was fantastic from the hostess opening the door and the servers pre bussing are table. I believe a manager stopping to check on us as well. Let's not forget if you like beer definitely try a beer  flight!!!

3aWqsWxHpxWJL6gx-puLMw.text: Don't waste your time or money. Went here for lunch with my husband. I got the Ahi tuna and a side salad and he got the French dip with a salad instead of fries. I received my first salad with a whole lotta slimy pieces in it. I told our server Adam and then received another with less slimy pieces but still some. My husband was brought his salad and OMG how much slimy salad does this place have? We finally got our main dishes and my husband was brought a Reuben sandwich, not a French dip. No side for my husband. When we got the check we had been comped for my slimy salads but nothing for my husbands. We will not be going back!

uJInUP9oRkT6_7yuN2R21w.text: Great service. Great steaks at a great price. They happy hour is the best. The Stuffed salmon is to die for! The blacken salmon salad it also great. Staff is always so friendly and they always have great recommendations.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Blacken salmon salad

wDhK1-8V5GNlj7cCh5_n2w.text: I LOVE Hop Social. It truly is a scratch kitchen. The food is fresh and the cocktails are unique and delicious. Today I had the French dip (my fav French dip ever) and my fiance had the pot pie. Both are a must try. The fries are some of the best I've had along with the horsey sauce and ranch.  Adam was our server, and I hope we get to see him again next time because he was awesome! Great sense of humor, was attentive and so nice.  Definitely come try Hop Social

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. French dip and pot pie

XR6djvvVCep-twNXpQDouQ.text: First came here on a whim, with a friend who enjoys IPA beers. Great selection of IPAs. Staff is friendly and provides good service. The food is also good. Alot of the food has a spicy kick to it.  Food portions are pretty good sized and reasonably priced.  Some dishes were too much and had a nice portion of left overs....Not a bad problem to have. The happy hour has a great selection of drinks and food; at reasonable prices. It can get quite busy, crazy, and loud during happy hour. Friends could barely hear each other talk. It's a pretty good sized restaurant. I've had a number of food items from the main menu and almost everything on the happy hour menu. There hasn't been anything I didn't like. I'll be returning.

5K-KGvv5laKvpADTA7NGiQ.text: This is a nice place. Nice, Bright, Clean, Welcoming. The service was excellent... as was the food. I'm ready to drive back there right now.  Here goes:  Darcie and I came here on a Saturday afternoon. We sat a the bar. Again, great service, quite friendly, patient, and knowledgeable.   We ordered a Wedge salad - Cold, crispy, oh so satisfying!  !And! The Buttermilk Battered Crispy Fried Chicken Sandwich.  Note of caution - The menu cites the following ingredients: country gravy, lettuce, tomato, onion, ciabatta bun; BUT! they also add some sort of Mayo concoction... and Mr. P don't do the Liquid Chicken. They made me another one. So happy.   The sandwich was fantastic. It's so good it's gonna be a struggle not to order it again every visit.   I say "every visit" because Hop Social Tavern has officially entered the regular rotation.  Can't wait for the next time. I'm up for the struggle ;)

-TgsyWJDqvidr2U057fdmA.text: LOVE this place!!!!  They have an awesome happy hour in the bar and the food is great.  They also have a cute dining area with couches.  We had excellent service and will be back for sure!!

yi6df8lOc0akVy1xYnfL4g.text: Awesome daily happy hour menu including both food and drinks. My boyfriend and I are always looking for spots that offer happy hour on the weekends too, and this place was perfect. We visited on a Saturday, our food was delicious and came out quickly. Shared a few appetizers and had a couple drinks for a very good price. Felt clean but a little boring, but would definitely return for the prices and the food!

cdj5RlXvRP4Od_7onlfDpA.text: It is rare that I post a review that is more negative than positive.  Food and service was horrible. The food was bland and had no flavor . I was with a group of people and the only thing that was  goosd was the steak sliders. The margaritas were even awful. Our waitress kept commenting on how awful her day was and how she had been working since 11. I live an hour away and this place was a complete waste of time and money. I will say the decor is nice and the patio is cute. There is a happy hour but the food is so bad even happy hour prices are not worth it.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

Ek2QqHAxfNBQ0ZTEL9nY0g.text: Excellent addition to Chandler and the Chandler Mall area. Really enjoy the atmosphere, the decor, quality of food, and overall experience each time we go. Have told many friends who also have had a great experience.  Happy hour is fun. Lots of AZ beers to chose from and a few from the Northwest. Get the flight if you can't decide and try a few.   It's great to see the patio packed and inside each time we go. Let's me know they'll be around a long time Highly recommend

ixgCIqXM1YvsrvhA_1T6Jw.text: This place is awesome! The food was very good and service (Holly) was great! We came here before going to a concert for our friends birthday and all the staff at the restaurant signed a card for her! They also fixed this AWESOME ice cream sundae that was just so yummy that even though we were full from dinner, we made room, lol!!   I have already recommended this place to people and I will continue to tell everyone about it! Keep up the great work!!!

9kmV9tp2CkRKoyGfQNLErA.text: Special thanks to Angel for making my night so special made my night! Thank you so much such a kind, sweet and a great joy to talk to anytime. Definitely will be back lots in the near future

_TKruCXIDoF3FWPfQGJTmA.text: This review is a little overdue... Just had to post this after the experience I had here. First off, SHOUT OUT to Angel for being the most attentive and amazing bartender during my visit! Not only was I able to have a great business meeting and go over some great opportunities, I was also praised for picking such an amazing spot with great atmosphere to conduct a successful connection. Thank you to Angel for the great service, warm smile, and wonderful humor to make this a great experience. I will highly recommend this spot for any occasion to enjoy good food and great environment.

JLrhB-RV26VKwDdM-FPOZg.text: I went here a couple days ago for happy hour and it was delicious! The service was really good and friendly! Their happy hour menu is fantastic, the food and the drinks were really good! I got the fish tacos and fries with a Moscow mule! I would definitely recommend trying the fish tacos!! They were soo good! And I also got their donuts! They are to die for! They serve their donuts with caramel and chocolate sauce! This is a great place to go to if you want a nice hangout spot at night!

-dl1eeAZQDNPRcqYw_q-1A.text: Great place to hang and eat.  Had happy hour and loved the food and drink selection.  Eat on the patio during our awesome Arizonan weather.   Come with a friend or many, you'll all be satisfied.

82rUuL_nXLpUFyw5Q2evYA.text: Do yourself a favor and don't go here. This used to be one of my go to places and today changed that. Party of 8 and we waited over 40 minutes for our food - when it arrived it was cold. Sent my plate back and a good 20 minutes later it was sent to the table in a "to go" box (I would have liked to have lunch with my family). While I appreciate the server and manger trying to accommodate, it was a total disaster. To add insult to injury my "to go" box was absolutely disgusting.

kUS7mXbtRIAs6ItgQ6JO9w.text: I first came into this place because it's next door to the hotel I was staying in but I must say I've been back several times.  Huge local tap selection.  On a Monday night the crowd was thin at 8:30 but the place didn't seem at all dead, very nice atmosphere.  The bartender, Angel, made a great beer recommendation right away so I asked for a dinner recommendation.  Without hesitation she said the Cabernet Tenderloin Tips.  She wasn't wrong.  After dinner she set me up with some house made infused whiskey that was pretty damn good.  Go check out Angel, she won't steer you wrong.

Zp0cBCPS4Y6AuYvdnfuqcA.text: Came here twice for happy hour with my coworkers. You can only get the happy hour deals if you're sitting in the bar area or outside on the patio. Service is extremely slow. The first time I came here, our server took orders one at a time. She literally came up to our table, took one of our orders and walked away. Didn't even ask if anyone else needed anything or checked in on us very often. You know when you try to get someones attention before they walk away, but they completely fail to acknowledge you? Yea, that was us every single time she stopped at our table haha.   They have 52 beers on tap, a lot of local brews. Which is pretty neat. You get $1 off draft pints during HH. The steak bites were pretty good. & the spicy mac & cheese was very good as well. Does have a huge kick to it for those who like spicy food. If you cant  Handle too much spice, I wouldn't recommend ordering this dish. Donuts are awesome as well. They taste very similar to churro but more doughy haha. It comes with caramel on the side but they are still just as good if you eat them by itself. & who could forget about the prices during HH, they are awesome. Just wished the service was just as good as the food and drinks.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac &amp; Chz
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Steak bites!

DtY6gt9rdPkOKFZhgVwboA.text: Themis is a happening, modern spot! It's good for team outings, dates, with a wide selection to choose from.

PFiU_0rwhoCAnEHBO5SJnQ.text: I recently had the privilege of working with Sarah the manager to arrange my daughter and her friends prom dinner. Sarah went above and beyond to assist with the party of 50. She helped create a special menu and arranged everything. The food was fantastic and so was the service.  I highly recommend Hop Social! They were fantastic!

80Tqg_cNqdIo4mzMg2w3CA.text: Very busy for a Tuesday and a much older lively crowd. The pretzel appetizer is delicious. Good selection of beers (some local) server wasn't well educated on the revolving choices. Disappointing considering it is a beer place. Grilled steak salad with Brussels sprouts was good, pizza was not. The Italian sausage pizza was loaded with green and black olives making it very salty and there was nothing special about the crust. Glad to see the crowd. Great prices for happy hour but you must sit in the bar.  Second trip and loved the veggie burger. So unique with black beans, beets and sauteed poblano! Lots of flavor and the texture was good, and because of the beets it was a beautiful red. Also the buttermilk fried chicken with mashed potatoes and gravy was fantastic, crispy juicy and tender. The donuts might be my favorite item on the menu, perfect amount of cinnamon and powdered sugar but the caramel sauce was perfection!! Do not resist the urge to indulge, it was worth every calorie bite!

dOID2qxU1lqart9dDTwGBQ.text: EXCELLENT experience, we celebrated my moms birthday here, it had great drinks and appetizers! I ordered a veggie burger and I have already revisited.  the waiter was great, even signed a card to give to my mom with a treat on the house!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

u2g96nYhMoP14mGFr-q5uA.text: Great place, among a plethora of shops bars and restaurants. Busy, crowded but plenty of seating. Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Great burger....fries are well...some fast food joints serve up fries that make their fries look silly.
