KcQCulmiG15w_TB8JG5Fyg.text: Amazing soul styled, home cooking, scratch food. Great beers on tap. Chicken pot pie and meatloaf are amazing! Chicken sandwich was ok. Wasn't a fan of the donuts.

a_piUv3qDHGOVjTuf1KVVA.text: I loved the beers and thought the happy hour food was fine. I am excited to go back for dinner.  The vibes and my waitress were wonderful. :)

zAS5xUKTnHExzN8nxIwzqg.text: Angel is so amazing.   She made Christians birthday dinner extra special! We always have a blast at the bar when angel is here!

xCZIP78kXY1zzNFrm9lVUw.text: Angel took amazing care of us tonight - great food & drinks! Made our Monday worth it!

X6cDS8z7AiQgINuyhnsIPA.text: Everything was pretty good! Reliable service and something on the menu for everyone.   You might be tempted to get a burger or one of the usuals on the menu BUT I have to say the Kung Pao Chicken was one of the best I ever had. Not too deep fried or too spicy, it was perfect. I still think about it sometimes. So if you're willing to order out of the box get one of the Asian fusion dishes, you won't regret it.

cIQjb-nLb8XNQGVptj6Orw.text: I'd driven by here a few times and it always looked busy so I figured I would have my birthday dinner here with friends. At first, I wasn't exactly sure what to expect (I remember when it used to be the Elephant Bar) but I was pleasantly surprised.   The entire place has been remodeled and it has a cool "modern" vibe. There is also a nice outside area if you want to sit outside. The staff was super friendly and very accommodating.  As for the food, it was pretty good! Not to sound cheap, but it seemed to be a tad bit expensive but the food was good. I had the steak with mashed potatoes and asparagus. Definitely something that I would recommend! They also had a nice selection of alcohol.  Lastly, when they found out that it was my birthday, they gave me a banana split and a nice card signed by the entire staff (and thankfully they didn't sing).  Definitely a place I would go back to!

oIMfYNktbZJixqf03bCePw.text: Angel Levi is absolutely amazing  we will DEFINITELY be back!!!! Great  food and great drinks

ETtVDibOppa3sh7DU7J6tQ.text: Beautiful people work there. Beautiful decoration.  The food tho taste below average. I think the owner forgot to survey around the chandler area and see how competitive and diverse (ethnic food) business in this city. You can't just serve regular bar tasting food. Make your food the reason customer wants to come back!  I suggest the franchise to check out it's competitors nearby(places I would consider going before Hop Social) - Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen in Chandler. Equally beautify decorated but the food is good and cost much less on drinks.  - Wildflower Bread Company inside of Chandler mall. Great sandwich and salad options! Fraction of the price. Your competition to lunch crowd. - Meridiem Kitchen & Lounge. Very nice environment. Great for business meeting and social events! - And tones of other restaurants in chandler downtown.

pc_ugvTrszO9qbFOHfRLUg.text: Beer cheese and pretzels tasted like someone dumped a LOT of salt into it. It was completely inedible. We didn't even touch the cheese part and the pretzels were topped with MORE SALT.   I ordered the buttermilk chicken salad which came dressed with a raspberry vinaigrette - and when I asked about the dressing choice people didn't really seem to know what was printed on the menu. Not only that the cucumbers were soggy and looked like they had been frozen and the salad hadn't even been picked through for bad or off looking pieces. You can tell when someone in the kitchen doesn't really care what kind of food they're putting out and that's what it looked like from our perspective.   The manager came by to check- her question to me at the table wasn't the best. "I heard your salad came out with the wrong dressing" :-/ I was thoroughly unhappy but didn't want to make a big deal about it, I tried to eat it but, it just wasn't good with that raspberry dressing. I thought the manager would comp the salad as a whole seeing as how it was the kitchens fault that it came out wrong but decided to charge me for the chicken. I think she should have just taken it off completely.

tlzeyShLoLe0IyCg-UqChA.text: This is a big, nice, beautiful space with plenty of bar and patio along with regular seating.  There's like 50+ beers on tap, a ton of them are local too which is great (and real local, not Four Peaks' fake ass version of local) and so if you're just drinking then this place is probably more like a 4 star.  But their food is kinda iffy.  The steak bites are...ok.  It's just steak and balsamic with too much steak seasoning but it isn't bad for the price.  Don't order the artichoke dip though, christ.  It was like greenish Elmer's Glue.    Some other reviewer said the meals aren't great and while I didn't order much else in the way of food, the stuff that I saw I tend to agree didn't look great.  I hate the fact that I'm agreeing with that reviewer though because they started off by saying "I'm a foodie" which might as well be the same as saying "I'm a bland and boring piece of crap who thinks the fact that I eat food makes me special".  Seriously, stop calling yourselves foodies, people, you look like assholes.  Anyway, this place has the potential to be pretty good but that menu has to get better.  Earn your extra stars, Hop Social.  I'll be back.

qXPKpBwOfRUBiVGiR165Mg.text: Cool spot, fun atmosphere...good beer list... 12 West KLAX on a rotating tap, and the food was pretty good too!  Service was quick and good...but the waitress tried some shady moves on the check change, weird but whatever.  Otherwise, a pretty good experience for a Thursday evening.

7_n5TUnN42LDxEp7DPR9YA.text: Went there on New's Year's Eve.  Think the owner(s) were in town checking out their newest creation. They have years and years of family restaurant businesses.  (I heard Farrell's Ice Cream Parlor was their creation in 1962 from Portland).  Our bartender was friendly and made my wife an amazing chocolate or coffee martini.  They other bartender wanted to make another since she jokingly bragged "hers was better".  It was a fun way of getting us to order another martini. Everyone was cool.  Great remodel of the former restaurant.   Great local and not-so local craft beer line up.    If the prices of beer were a bit better, I would go back more often.  Sounds weird, but on the app menu, not for dessert, you must order the donuts.  Perfect with a beer!

wcXzv8YMnB_km3r6TvvWEA.text: My friend and I come here regularly and get treated amazing by the staff. Angel and Levi are the best we love them. I always have a great experience until today. We arrived and as Angel went to grab our drinks without having to order as usual she said hang on I don't have a happy hour red up here. She went and talked to the blonde manager and asked if she can serve us a different wine since they were out. The manager said no so angel asked if we bought a bottle of the next cheapest wine could she sell it to us for the HH price, again right in front of us the manager said no. She looked at us and said sorry guys we just don't have it tonight. If it wasn't for Angel and Levi we would have gotten up and left. I get that you run out of stuff but when a exception can be made in this industry you make it. All night the servers were coming to the bar asking why they couldn't serve something else and they had to go back to their tables and tell them no. We will always be back because of the service we receive but dissatisfied with the manager tonight. We are not cheap just HH is HH and when you come to a bar because of their happy hour you expect it.

vKiyk1huASzpRNjoY9QRtQ.text: Pretty good food, decor, location, awesome beer selection, and service. My only issue was sitting at the bar...the bar stools all wobble as if you're sitting on a spring and make you feel drunk just sitting there. Other than that, no issues.

hzq10j5AJc_1d5j_22B3QA.text: First time here at happy hour. service was outstanding very informative about the menu and answered any questions. Quantity of food to price is impeccable! Great for a date night and we will be back again: GM was on the floor talking to guests making sure all were happy!  The home made donuts with caramel sauce will garuntee a return from you

tnjVszlJfyDh7UNDUmiTzA.text: Love this place! Awesome beers on tap and yummy food, but hands down, that cookie dessert with milk is amazing!   It's a great date spot. Fun atmosphere; it can get a little loud.

mC5cd4cUadONvxmZ2BLA8g.text: We came here for an early dinner on 4th of July. It wasn't packed so we got seated right away. I ordered a martini to start. There was a martini that I saw someone posted on Yelp that I wanted to try. They tried to replicate it. Minty Vanilla martini. It wasn't the same, but still tasted good. I ordered the stuffed salmon and my husband ordered the Cabernet tenderloin tips. Everything was really good and flavorful. The tenderloin was so tender and perfect.   The customer service was really good. The manager came over to ask me about the drink that I wanted and how it was. We'll definitely be back to try some other items.

0F50vaXD6kMCBXViwYBLqg.text: Service was atrocious. So was the drink quality. With two people serving one section of less than 10 tables. There is no excuse for this delay. (They asked the table across from me numerous times if they had been served, and that table looked annoyed at the excessive attention while I received little to none.   It took more than 15 minutes from the time I placed my drink order for it to arrive, and I had to wait another 15 minutes after my drink was haphazardly slid across the bar to me (and she spilled a significant amount of it) to be able to place my food order. The drink was also incredibly sweet yet also watered down. Think watery juice with extra sugar.   Also had to cancel my food order (a salad) after waiting nearly an hour for it to hit the table from the time I ordered.   Definitely not a place to grab a quick bite, even when they aren't busy.   Service staff was rude and many seemed like they were new to waitressing/hosting entirely. Altogether, a terrible experience. I will not return.

pKf6DJdNMAyiGXXToIDGUw.text: Food is good. It's just unfortunate that the service was horrible. It's almost like Carly didn't really care to serve us since we came for happy hour. Mind you it wasn't busy at all. We came at 9:15 pm, plenty of tables open so there really shouldn't be a reason for a such a long wait to even put in an order or get a refill on my water.  I've been here with my sisters, I took my husband here tonight for his first time and sadly he never wants to come back.

wLbv2JL8n0QkQ-Knj__SNw.text: Went here for drinks and apps with my sis in law. I got the roasted beet & spinach salad and the brussel sprouts. Both were awesome. SIL got the Tuscan kale salad. She really liked it. Service was so fast and the servers were really nice. I'm a fan and can't wait to go back!

ekirIAkJl6BaeJPjY1nDSg.text: We had a really nice time there and very good food. Our waitress Morgan was really fun, friendly, and helpful. She suggested a strawberry mojito to drink which was wonderful, and also gave good food and beer recommendations. I also really liked the pot pie and donuts for dessert. She made sure to get the donut order in at happy hour prices. Overall it's a little pricey but a great atmosphere and food and drinks. The patio looks nice to try during good weather.

8689h4i0zsoZWrz0KAZygg.text: I co-organize a book club for work. We gathered here at 3:00. Just in time for happy hour! When we first arrived the noise level was average, around 5:30 is does get a little loud.   I ordered the Kung Pao Lettuce Wraps - the sauce was delicious and the chicken had amazing flavor, but the lettuce didn't hold its shape very well.   Overall, a great place for groups. If you are a beer drinker, they have lots of options!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Came here for my book club. Drinks priced fairly and tasty options for little snacks.
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Happy hour :)

jW3AXj7poWBl87Ife_xX3Q.text: If i could give it 3.5 i would but 3 will do. We came with a large group and while we were accommodated quickly and the staff prompt with service, I'd prefer this spot for drinks rather than a sit down dinner.  I've been a few times for happy hour and its good just a sit down is alright.

WcNqu4NzCaQvUSL_BXu55A.text: This is such a great restaurant!! I couldnt wait till it opened! I have been mulitple times and each time i have had a great experience!! Very friendly staff and great service! The flat bread and the mongolian beef will make your taste buds dance! Your tongue will not be able to handle the awesomeness! Love how they have a diverse menu and have over 50 craft beers on tap. I would highly recommend going!! They have very generous portions! I cant wait to go back!

KPaqI_vIqLMg4cbRhv0bKQ.text: Loved this place. Took our grandpa here. He wanted some meatloaf when he saw on menu. He loved it. He's old school when it comes to meatloaf but he ate every bite. There was 6 of us. We loved the burgers and ambiance. Thanks for a wonderful time

fl-tdV98Qb0kR8f6P1hcxg.text: Food was average, a lot of options for drinks. Riley was an awesome waitress. One of her leg was hurt and she was hopping around but still remain super friendly and attentive on a Saturday night. I would have gave a 5 stars but I think they can do better with the food.

lERIGMXoQbxdPMVoMjLNKw.text: A fun upbeat decorated restaurant with many meal options to choose from. The menu mix is quite interesting as it's well diversified (inspired by Chinese, Japanese, Vietnamese and not to mention American).  While the service was excellent and I wanted to give it a 5 star but the food was decent. I had the poke bowl and the rice was hard and the sweet and sour sauce didn't go well with the dish. It should be seasoned with soy sauce, sesame oil and Japanese Mirin along with other traditional sauces. On the other hand, their salad looked good.

euHAjg0g6_8H9dV3S7kqTA.text: Sometimes it just "Hop" and miss. Partially my fault on this. When you order off the menu slight deviations and such you take your chances. However this visit was just off! 7/22/19:  California roll: something was terribly wrong with one of the food groups in the roll.  We almost narrowed down to cucumber but couldn't be sure! - they were kind enough to omit from bill. Blackened chicken with pasta - good and spicy a hit.  But when you order plain pasta just know it's plain and aldente where you can tie bows for fun! Guess I was schooled to orders minus the veg! Blackened Caesar salad  - God I messed up and I guess forgot to mention his time....I think...... - offered to pay my mistake but they remade it to go.  Note to self NEVER get hot chicken on top of a cold salad and take it home.  Came home and it was soup.  Gross Off the menu (grid) garlic cheese bread! .....whatever happens to garlic or cheese bread with a garlic salad lol! - we'll see picture I got sort of cheese bread!  But oh well!  That's what I get for going off menu! Thanks to the staff for being so cool about it!

0gkcGrA8JzdJ5BIMCRHBnQ.text: When it comes to food or hospitality service; you either got it or you don't, there's no in-between. In my 3 visits, Hops Social Tavern has been nothing short of amazing. Vast selection on both food and drink menu, not boring at all. Food is delicious. One of a few places in the valley that has a reverse happy hour (9-close). Best of all, I've had nothing but outstanding service. A huge shout out to Angel, Thank you for always creating an amazing experience!

mIRC6tvzAuFwEUB6SE_l8A.text: Time to make like a bunny and hop hop hop on over to Hop Social Tavern!  We strolled in one evening after spin class to eat back every single calorie we burned off. Not only that, as over-achievers, we even ate back MORE than what we burned off. We make bad life choices, okay?  I got a Spicy Mac & Cheese. It was a delicious dish of mac & cheese but it wasn't spicy at all. No biggie though because while misleading, it was still a solid dish. I don't need my culo to burn to enjoy my food. I also nabbed a few bites of the Thai Prawn Linguini. That peanut sauce was tasty! I also stole a bite of my friend's Chicken Pot Pie and goodness... it was dang good! Our waitress had told us that it was the owner's mother's recipe. *kisses fingertips* We were also told about how their fried chicken is soaked in buttermilk for hours and other tidbits of facts about their menu.  Service was great. I enjoyed parking my spin class abused bum on the squishy booths and the ambiance was just right. I can see myself coming back here again!  3.5 stars but rounding up for the excellent service.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Strawberry Punch.
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Fish Tacos, $12.95
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Thai Prawn Linguini, $16.95

Qf3bjo4IM_jQOCLFr7cs6Q.text: I had a Ruben. Hubs had a burger. My sandwich was very good, large and full of quality pastrami. Our fries were delicious, clearly fresh, house-made.  Our server was friendly and left nothing to be desired.  I will definitely eat there again.

ly6m69MaLbIk6xi5GgksHQ.text: Best Happy Hour in town. I was expecting smaller portions but I got the tacos and a salad and my daughter got the pulled pork sliders and we wound up boxing left overs. Everything I've had has been tasty and the service is great. Ian was my server last time & he was so considerate that he made sure to even ask me before my daughter got a refill on her soda. Highly recommended.

-vNumlyqDg9yX1J1wdxauw.text: Today was our first time here and we were impressed with the food selection and our bartender Angel was very friendly and accommodating. We had the lettuce wraps, fish tacos and California roll. The lettuce wraps and fish tacos were exceptionally delicious. We will be back to try some more food items.

R2aDIET0S5vPdik5L5DwUQ.text: I wish it was closer to downtown Scottsdale.  Overall great food, drinks and service.  It does have the same type of feeling as other gastropubs.  It's in standalone building in the Chandler Mall complex. Lots of parking.  If the hostess isn't busy she even opens the front door for you. What a nice touch.  Came here for Arizona Restaurant Week with several friends.  The artichoke, spinach and cheese dip was so good my friend was quivering with delight.  The calamari had a nice crispy coating with a excellent aioli that had just the right amount of heat.  We also got the homemade donuts which wasn't on the Arizona Restaurant Week menu.   The donuts were great. In fact I make similar donuts at home. Who doesn't love fresh deep fried donuts?   Everyone had the stuffed salmon.  It was good, but the crab and shrimp stuffing gets lost in the salmon.  Also the accompanying asparagus was overcooked or old.  It was shriveled, but still tasty.     The atmosphere is casual and a little noisy as the hard floor and ceiling bounce the noise around.  Service was excellent.  I still love them opening the doors as I came in and left. lol

Rvw0ytE6f_7-0ugT_Bqu3g.text: So many issues with our first visit here and I had this place book marked since it opened.   My husband was very disappointed to learn that the chicken pot pie was not available. The bartender/server told us that more were being made but it would be an hour or so before they were ready. He decided on a salad so we could get our order in quickly.  I ordered a ROASTED BEET SALAD with citrus, spinach, chicken, and candied walnuts, with the mustard dressing on the side. My husband ordered ordered the strawberry, pear, feta salad with arugula. What we got did not match the menu description. The salads should have been named, ARUGULA salad with strawberries, etc. and mine, SPINACH salad with beets. My salad had about 3 slices of 1inch long beets, about 3 ounces of chicken and a pile of spinach. I was really looking forward to the roasted beets which are one of my favorites. To top it off, our order took more than 20 minutes. It's a salad...what was the hold up? It wasn't that busy by that time. I had to ask our server to check on our order, which she swiftly brought out and said our order "happened to be ready" right when she asked. I have a feeling that she forgot about it and swooped in to pick them up.  In addition, she neglected to bring my dressing.   The problem I believe was that this is a holiday and many folks were off work and the restaurant was understaffed. I feel sorry for the bartender who had to act as server too. How in the world could she stay on top of things as she worked the bar. She was very sweet and did the best she could.   It's really disappointing to spend $13 on a plate load of spinach and not be remotely satisfied or at least not be hungry. We decided a second lunch was in order and had to hold back to not head to In 'n Out which I desperately needed.  Last, the added bonus is that I got walnut shells in my salad that almost broke a tooth. I'd post a photo, but it's kinda gross.   Sorry HST, we won't be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Look at all those beautiful taps. Nice selection.

md2bz1a2Rq6FQELpeCJLdA.text: First time visiting tonight and everything was great. Love the happy hour menu and wide range of food options. California roll was excellent as was the sweet chicken and pretzel and cheese. Can't wait to go back

heugk08FCZz8O-PKcnOJ6Q.text: Everything about this place is great. Their beer selection is extensive, service is always excellent and everything on the food menu is delicious.

05bFzAbn6eYVrEN-5axFnw.text: Angel is an amazing bartender! She truly takes care of you and has an amazing personality! Her contagious, fun loving spirit will truly brighten your day! This place has many wonderful beers to offer - domestic and craft plus a full service bar. The food is also wonderful. Must come to if you are in Chandler. You should sit at the bar and give Angel a visit for an amazing experience that will leave you coming back again!

6mlfnPvhc2wY5qcc2Qr2fQ.text: I first have to say I will be coming back.  The reason as to why I did not give a full 5 stars is because we made a reservation and we came in with a party of four when they went to seat us she took us to a table that was fairly small that only had two chairs at it. The hostess just had us crowed around the table while they found us extra chairs (which seemed very difficult to them) we ended up asking if we could switch tables because it was a small table and because we didn't want to stand around and wait for our chairs.   Other than the issue with the chairs, our waitress was amazing came back multiple times to ask if we needed any drinks. She recommended a lot of different types of foods that were popular which was nice as well. The food came out fairly quickly for how busy it was. I would definitely recommend to make a reservation before coming in since it is busy all of the time. I thought all of the ladies that worked there were extremely nice and helpful, again besides the issue we had with the original table.

MAtaNBsZKxcz1XdHZVS2VQ.text: Not impressed at all.   Our server was Bri; some little blonde girl, seems harmless. Ordered a cup of soup for my mom and a salad for myself to start which never came out. Our entrees, a dinner salad and a pizza, came out first  so we had to ask the food runner about our original side salad and cup of soup which they said they would go grab. By the time my salad came I had already grubbed out on a slice of pizza. what's even the point of having the salad? We asked about why our food came out backwards and the server said "the kitchen just does whatever they want." Okay, nice. I feel more comfortable after that answer. Yeah, no.   I only came here because my mom wanted to come here. I honestly would have rather spent a cool $60 somewhere else.   2/10 would not recommend.  The place looks nice but the service could be way better. Food is decent. Pizza wasn't a total waste. Salads were actually really good. My mom said her drink got poured with a heavy hand so you win some and you lose some. Maybe if I drank I wouldn't have been so bummed out about the service. Not sure though and I won't be coming back to find out.

hW0wbXTevQ_8bpzRsS93Yg.text: We came here for the first time and it met all expectations.  Our waitress was amazing, the food was to die for.  We had too many delicious options to choose from which will keep us coming back.  Celebrated a birthday here which included an awesome Sunday and personalized birthday card.  Such awesome environment and personalities here.  We will definitely be back.

H5SJ1JLvMw1GWyEEgNw9Sw.text: Food was amazing. We had the tenderloin tips, bacon wrapped filet and some other yummy items. Service was okay. Served wrong beer and had to get up from the table and find another server to get the right one. Also one entree came 5 minutes or so after the others. There was a ton of fruit flies the whole time we were trying to eat. The food is what really sells the place.

dm-VixpVkLVLmNCLIaDekw.text: Very excited to find a place that offers a taste of Oregon with the flair of Arizona. Love the food, the drinks and service. The atmosphere is fun, though I gave it a four star because it can get a bit loud when full. Which of course means it's well liked.

mbB5RbUBAkBMT2hBar6L2g.text: Angel was da bomb! She was attentive and always making sure we were taken care of. We were visiting from Canada and recommend this to all people visiting the area.

WbsXwCntU9fzJbpHDSnvwg.text: Not bad food was okay and the service was mediocre. The best part about the service was the lady holding the door for us.

hP5M4xb59f2uxN7D4hDUoA.text: We've given this place 3 tries, because we really wanted to like it, especially because of the beer selection. All 3 visits had horrible service. My honest opinion is it's not the servers, it's management. Based on our observations, it seems to be poorly run. Which is sad, because the atmosphere is great. The food is just ok. My husband really liked the fried chicken. Other things we have tried: -calamari, menu says it's hand cut, it doesn't taste fresh at all, and is overbreaded -hamburger, tasted like a skinny frozen patty -asparagus, all 3 times over cooked  -coleslaw, really good -fish and chips, fish was good but overbreaded and really greasy so couldn't finish it -chicken fingers, good After 3 tries, we won't be back :(  BUT- if you're looking for place to just go sit at the bar and have a good beer, this is the place!

AhrW5zBd4GqaLTvsg_7j-w.text: Much nicer than expected!  We tried the  happy hour scene and we loved It! Place is huge and gets busier as time goes on around sunset. We had a nice selection to choose from (food and drinks).  I had the taco fish happy hour for $5.95. My husband had the Chicken and fries, our friend had the steak with salad. Taco was super good and portions were huge. Flavor wise it was spot on.  My husband picked chicken and Gallo, and praised it.  Our friend like the steak slices but would have preferred the Chicken when he saw it on our table. All appetizers were priced around $5 or less. My taco fish  (2) were big and soooo good!  When compared with Sand Bar, from this point on, l'd rather go to Hop Social anytime!  Food and beverages tasted better, prices were a lot lower for what we got. Also even though it got really busy, we could still have a conversation, they don't overload you with sounds. We will be back soon!

1D6u2vK6D5ALBpQSrievhw.text: OMG!!!!! ANGEL! ...is my new best friend..Her Martinis are Awesome!!!!..She made me a blueberry martini , ..Im in love,....But then she made a pear martini for my husband....Okkkk Im in Love all over again again!!!!lolololo..She is awesome..  Also the service was Awsome and we were sitting at the bar... Shout out also to Stephanie who made me and the hubby the first drink which was the passiondrop martini (wildberry )!!!!!!!!!!!loveeeee .. food was great too!.   ANGEL!!! I WILL DEFINITELY BE BACK!!!

bw_ij8I2xgRJhEWicq05KA.text: My wife and I came to Hop for Valentine's Day due to Firebirds 3 hour wait. The first thing that scored points with us was zero wait time.   Our server was quite pleasant and attentive. He made sure we were comfortable and satisfied. One point of improvement I would suggest is to make sure he knows that you do have hot drinks as well. Nothing on the mnThe manager came around multiple times as well.  One thing I should have counted on with a venue like this was how noisy it was. But the noise level was such that it could have made it impossible for the waiter or cook to hear medium well as opposed to medium rare for my steak.   Speaking of my steak. Sorry Firebirds! This ribeye dwarfed yours.  This was nearly a plate-sized ribeye. It was definitely quite tasty and gives Firebirds a run for their money.  For an appetizer, we had the corn fritters which we tore up faster than a school of piranha on a carcass. They had the right combination of texture and flavor. The honey sauce was excellent. It is sourced locally but has the same taste and texture as Manuka honey.  Overall, the experience was pleasant and we will return.  My wife had the chicken tender salad and was quite happy. The tenders looked quite good and the portions were large enough for her to eat the next day.

ulBISUi_sK4jzXD28rvxlA.text: My husband and I were so excited to see this place was open and to try it. Unfortunately it didn't live up to the hope. We sat on the outdoor patio (open seating) at 2pm on a Sunday - it was not busy. About 1/3 of the tables had people at them.   Menu: great list of items and excellent beer list!  Service: unbelievably slow!!! Order for drinks and apps went in in good time. 15 minutes later we had to flag down our waiter and tell him we wanted to place an order for food. All drinks seemed to fly out quickly. Unfortunately our beer flight had beer spilled in all the holes - sloppy. Our appetizer (spinach dip and chips) came 30 minutes later which was a little slow but ok.    The poor part was that we didn't get our food (hamburger and salad) until 3pm. Our waiter came and said "I don't know what's going on with the kitchen". No apology, no comped drinks or app. I was disappointed. Our waiter came outside only once ever 15 minutes which meant no water refills. I do have to say it looked like the waiter was working his tail off inside, just didn't pay as much attention to his 2 outside tables. He gave us the bill and within 1 minute we put the credit card on it. It wasn't picked up for 15 minutes (no joke, I timed it).   Price: overpriced. My salad was $14 and to be honest the two small pieces of breaded chicken were cold.  The salad itself was arugula dressed with a nice dressing (although the blackberry seeds  can feel like their nearly break your teeth) and sprinkled with cheese with 2 black berries. To me this salad was barely worth $10. To top it off, it cost the same as my husbands burger and fries.

5HjY-YreiTqPhmlbO6PrZQ.text: What a GREAT experience. Service is great food is simply amazing and the beer is fantastic. Try the Mr Pineapple beer and never look ok back. I don't even live in this state... but ANY time we come back I'm here, period.

yF7eQRxq2vJ56AdfsIxSmA.text: Okay. So I'm from Oregon and a little bit of an IPA snob. I noticed that this establishment has a lot of Oregon beers. Bonus points out the gate. With that said I only drank AZ beers. I had glass of Moonjuice IPA and was thoroughly impressed. Had to followup with a flight of only Arizona brewed IPAs. I was not disappointed. The great beers combined with an AMAZING Roasted Turkey Club just solidified my night. The servers were beyond nice and attentive and if I could give this place more than five stars I would.

P9zcV9gf-SKsA5oXI7T27A.text: I highly recommend this place.  My experience was outstanding and you absolutely have to sit at the bar and chat with Angel.  She was 3 out of 3 with her recommendations.   I had the PB&J Burger and although I was very skeptical, it was by far one of the best burgers I have ever had.  Also, their beer selections were fantastic.  I will definitely be coming  back every time I'm in town.  Thanks Angel, and see you next time.

LOP-hjcwfePZi1DDe14eEg.text: Honestly such an amazing experience here! I had been in here one time before and really enjoyed it however this time exceeded my expectations. From the food to the drinks we enjoyed every piece of our meal, and our waitress, Bri, was most accommodating. The real selling point was the manager, Joe, that came to our table and checked on us. He had a genuine conversation with us about my husbands hat (he was wearing a Modern Times hat). After this he came by with 3 beers for my husband to try from Modern Times! How amazing is that! I mean honestly haven't had that great of service in a while!  Will 100% be back very soon!   PS- Get the meatloaf or pot pie! You won't regret it!

DLSXDHBTkKZt59TTHARKlw.text: Stopped in saturday evening ( feb 10 ) for dinner. Busy place..  we made reservations and we were seated within 5 minutes. Recommend Saturday evenings to make reservations otherwise 45 min wait.. Waitress Erika was very friendly and professional. Made our visit delightful. Atmosphere was very unique. Booths, high tops, low tops, couchs and chairs, bar seating , regular dining tables, outside patio seating. Decor was excellent. Open kitchen to dining area is immaculate.  We had a grilled chicken sandwich and a meatloaf dinner. The bill was a reasobable $30. Chicken was tender and bun roll it came on was delicious. The meatloaf was exceptional with garlic mashed potatoes and cooked carrots topped with onion strings. All very tasty. We were impressed with the complete experience. A definite return in the future..  thumbs up !!!!!

r_p2EKi1l6VtrlreMZI6RQ.text: Awesome food, great service, delicious drinks! Definitely will be back & so glad this opened in my neighborhood!

4UDcRN7HPoWGB9TFnynKbQ.text: I stay in this area for business quite frequently. I usually go to Firebird. My wife and I came to visit family and I thought I would take her to Firebird. We drove in from Vegas and were very hungry. Firebirds had a 30-40 minute wait, so we decided to walk next door to Hop Social Tavern. Expectations weren't that high thinking it was just another tavern.  Was pleasantly surprised when we walked in. It has a great layout and was decorated very nicely. They said it would be about a 15 minute wait, so we decided to stay. Glad we did! About 5 minutes later, the seated us.   They have large selection of beers, most being local. I asked our waitress, Ariel for her recommendations and she was very helpful.   We decided to start with the pretzels. They are probably the best I have ever had. Could be shared by 4 people, but were so good, my wife and I almost finished them.  My wife ordered the fish and chips. Although not the best she has ever had, she was very happy with them. She could not eat even half of it. Their portions are fairly large.  I went with Ariel's recommendation of the spicy Mac & cheese. Wow! It was awesome. The perfect balance of flavor and heat. Again, maybe the best I've had. Portion was also so big, I could only finish a little over half.  We finished with their desert doughnuts that was also recommended. Very good.  I will definitely eat here again and look forward trying different items on the menu. Our table was actually close to the open kitchen and we saw many of the dishes that were being served. They all looked good, especially the pot pie and burgers.   I just wish we had one in Vegas!

D0M-ENzCqIU5nfG14XuobQ.text: We went for a birthday. I put that fact in our reservation notes but it was not acknowledged. First time at this restaurant and the experience was less than stellar. Our server - Ruger - was MIA all night. He came back once to ask if we wanted more drinks...which was about 45 minutes into our dinner. Took our orders and then disappeared. Someone else brought out our food, put it on the table, and walked away. We had no silverware to eat with. Took us another 5 minutes to flag someone down so we could actually begin eating our meal. My sandwich order, which is not a difficult dish, was missing the bacon, and ordered no mustard, which was abundantly spread on my food. It appears no one really cares what the customer orders, nor actually servicing the patrons who are sitting there eating. Sorry to be so harsh, but it was a very disappointing experience having been there for the first time. :-/

3SJXf6DO45c4gqzB-Z-k1Q.text: I absolutely enjoyed the ambiance! The chicken pot pie is a must try and It had a wonderful story behind it. The staff was very professional and friendly.

fxLgBPOJtMOAX99ngCnJhg.text: Had the Pear Strawberry Apple Salad, on the first visit. Delicious! For sure my favorite. Next visit, I tried the Hazel Nut Chicken Crusted Salad and it was good. Will be returning for sure!

EZ6sXrhXEhkHbW5RsF3Ziw.text: Tuesday night around 7pm with a good crowd. Greeted by several hostesses that were smiling and friendly. Our server, Marcus, was very friendly, gave many suggestions and his personal favorites with the brews and food. We got the bacon-wrapped meatloaf and the Cuban pulled pork sandwich. Both meals were excellent and would absolutely order them again! about 40-something beers that are constant and about 5-10 rotating handles of seasonal or specialty brews. Very similar vibe to the Yardhouse locations around the valley. Everything was very clean, our service was great and my IPA was very fresh (local McFate). Nice job, but nothing really stands out as a "new" concept, which I'm not sure they are claiming. The food and service spoke for itself, and for that reason I'll happily go back and recommend.

Rs3qWueA-hQMp6r_t9bq6g.text: This restaurant has a really good happy hour, but you do need to make sure you get there early as the bar area fills up. They have very good apps (steak bites and pretzels are the best) and a lot of beers I enjoy. I recommend getting a flight as it will be hard to settle on just one beer. The only downside is you cannot get happy hour in the whole restaurant.

KFWPvyMfkkGJZvygksbC6Q.text: Love this place! The owners are very sweet people and have really put a lot of hard work into opening this place. They walk around and ask for input and are very sincere. Great atmosphere. Excellent happy hour and friendly staff. Try the steak bites... delicious!

8712E5u1LFtUIl-NHxt0RA.text: Great new hang-out spot! Food was fantastic and the ambiance was hip, and super clean. Almost like a Fox Restaurant but more affordable. Haha

nZrIoxV7GN9yOJ4AluXzbg.text: This new Tavern near the Chandler Fashion Mall has a comfortable atmosphere for all! Solid tunes, TV's and food. Happy Hour is always busy and they have an ample  list of appetizers to try. If you sit at the bar, make sure to ask for Angel. She will greet you with a smile and plenty of personality! An excellent offering of mixed drinks and craft beers. I have not been disappointed with a food item yet. Give it a visit and you will become a regular!

MdcxxfeHynAsl8UcPNlkRA.text: Amazing service from all the staff and just as important, delicious food. My family and I will definitely be regulars here. This place opened less than a week ago, I highly recommend you give them a try.

Nn-ZlQW0ZtEoyp7fHs-7FA.text: This will be my go to restaurant. The pretzel fondue was to die for!! Seriously, do not pass it up. My son who is a picky eater, really liked his chicken strips. They are made with a buttermilk batter and sooo good. My husband had the Gorgonzola Burger which was huge! It was very good and even better later in the day heated up. I had the spicy Mac and cheese and it was just ok. For me, it lacked a crunchy element. The service was excellent and our server Carrie (sp?) was great, very friendly and attentive. The atmosphere was inviting and there are TV to watch the games. The decor was trending without overdoing it. I can't wait to go back.

qvEuA_CZFNNIdhc3Kkq1vg.text: We have had positive experiences with both food and service in the past. Today the food was good however, the service was not on par. Didn't appreciate snarky comment from server about my family. Will return, but rubbed the wrong way this afternoon.

vgEvx-qeL79vec31qudU_w.text: Great food and service! This place just opened and all the food was delicious and tasted fresh. My mom commented that the fish in her fish and chips tasted fresh and not frozen- always a perk in a landlocked state :). I had the PB&J burger and my bro had the Gorgonzola burger- both were so good especially the Gorgonzola one. I liked the different menu options with lots of salads and healthy options as well as burgers and sandwiches. Clean, open layout, lots of beers....what more could you ask for?!

NX-oVM4HnMqj5ji1v7PdZg.text: Food was good but the service was really bad from star to finish. Before being seated for dinner we sat at the bar waiting for the rest of our party to arrive.  Five minutes later the bartender still hadn't served us so we went without a drink and they were not even busy.  Once we sat for dinner the servers were also not well educated on menu items and the food took forever to arrive.

_I2VgCGrsClBpI4YHbKNqg.text: Great staff and amazing food! Have had wonderful service every time we sit at the bar. Wonderful, fun, and great environment

44oNtpG_FPAOM3xYhNfSDQ.text: Great place with a menu that covers it all.  Service was exceptional, food was hot and delicious.  Will definitely be going back.

fxRgNrifMB_L5twrtBU8YA.text: It was okay. There was 6 of us for a meal and everyone ended up getting their meals at different times. It wasn't a HUGE deal, but I feel very uncomfortable eating my meal if everyone doesn't have their food. So I waited and mine got cold before theirs came. The food was pretty good. My friend had the pot pie that was supposed to be awesome. She said it was ok. Many people we know love the place, so we will definitely give it another try.

ly89KUSpoDRP9d_XK7Pt2w.text: The service and food at this new Chandler Restaurant is excellent! The carry 52 Craft Beers which makes this place a great place to relax & enjoy yourself. I had the Fish & Chips & my wife had the Chicken Pot Pie. Both were tasty & had very large portions. Well worth the money. This is our new favorite place! Nice job Hop Social Staff, keep up the good work & you'll be successful.

VwybX8S8FJsdU8lgYZu1tA.text: Stopped by to check it out.  They offer many local beers on tap.  Angel was our bartender and was great!!! We had a great time having a few drinks there.  Nice atmosphere.

U1uJ3enEZfTVtGc5SJW87w.text: Best place to have great food and with amazing beer choices!  Their happy hour is awesome from 3pm to 6pm and they also do a reverse HH.

5bUllFcu8TEC2dZ6V8lJ_g.text: Delicious food, great service.  Had the buttermilk biscuit chicken sammy and would get it again!!

xZPCZv1OVtVHv6LGjPcJfg.text: Angel the bartender rocks. I said "don't make me think" and she delivered everything on point. Great first time in Phoenix. Food and drinks are amazing

7dSilycb0E1r4E26Mxx3bw.text: Seems like a pretty cool place, but the staff all come across as pretty snobbish.  Otherwise, drinks are good but a bit pricey.

XmAFXWM96f3n5o7uEPA1Xg.text: Checked out this place with my buddy last week it was our first time there. I like the place and service was  great!  The food menu was interesting, thought I try out something new. We ordered calamari for appetizer, mushroom pizza, and the stuffed Gogonzola burger. The appetizer and pizza was delicious but didn't get a chance to taste the burger cause it came with a piece of hair in it .

P9g--7EKmouN1cyunaau2g.text: Fantastic!!!  The brownie dessert was to die for!  Angel, behind the bar, was very attentive and friendly.  She pushed the brownie dessert on us and I'm glad she did!!  I love the big TVs.  I will be back and I hope Angel is working  behind the bar!!

x1uoEVR3-qYR9ReTGR83Xw.text: I like this place but not sure. I have here twice - first time the waitress was friendly and quick. Second time not so much. It could be that we came on a busy night for a Wednesday or the waiter was new. Our waiter was practically absent during the time we were there. Someone from another party seemed to think the bar wasn't spectacular. Most of the wait staff were prompt. How long do you think it should to bring a ginger ale? It took maybe 20-30 minutes for my drink & 45 minutes for my sandwich. The waiter didn't come to update us. I'm not convinced yet and will update this review when I come again.

3Sz--4PEi36LrlHUtXXddg.text: Great service and food. Reasonably priced. Owners come around to make sure everything is good. More staff than typically bar, so you never have to wait long.

U9ttoviFoSECvL7qvkjKHw.text: First experience here was great! The service was great and so was the food. Plenty of tvs at the bar to watch games and they have great happy hour options- I tried the beer flight since I was unfamiliar with some of the beers. One of my new favorite spots in chandler.

LxemsYxMxM6NpRJ5uTiN4w.text: Went in on a crazy shopping day to meet a friend/s for lunch. Sat in the bar and had an awesome time. Our server was super friendly and very attentive. We all LOVED our food! My friend enjoyed her gluten-free beer too. We must've had 3 different managers check on us during our visit. We felt cared for and I personally enjoyed my meal immensely. I ordered the Kung pao chicken. My friend had chicken tenders with fries and gravy. I kept stealing hers too. Will definitely be back!

Rna0juO2KeHuDvON5-ApyA.text: This was my 3rd try here. I really wanted it to be a favorite because the beer menu is amazing! Unfortunately, the food just falls way too short. The first time was a spicy shrimp pasta. Tasted like a lean cuisine. Last time it was the Mac & cheese. Just no flavor at all. This time it was the chicken sandwich. It was SO SALTY....we tried picking pieces out to see what was the salt item...I think it was the sauce. Maybe the chicken? Not sure, but I'm done trying. I'm really bummed! The people are super nice! Service is great! Beer menu phenomenal! All moot without good food. Color me sad.

T2wS4JiWqkDbo5h1DwhXkA.text: We didn't know what to expect and were very pleasantly surprised. Excellent draft beer selection. Server was friendly, attentive and knowledgeable about all beers and food. Amazing steak salad. I will return specifically for this unique grilled salad. Great Cuban sandwich and fries, too. Happy to hear there may be another southeast location soon.

kvPXRZxHPaZI0v0PmfDYmQ.text: Incredible!! If I were to open a restaurant it would be exactly like this. The atmosphere is perfect the food is amazing and THE BEER!! 52 local beers on tap. Doesn't get any better than this.

7wT4Ne1Pu9rhLscgCq9uaw.text: We walked in to see what was going on a few months ago..they were having a "soft opening" and we were blown away by the atmosphere they created, the friendly staff and crazy menu...all great. Can't say enough. Oh, and our new Best Burger Perfection in town. Did I mention the home made fries? Thanks, David and Family.

lWYG3SGNML7qhsmpnETBFQ.text: Excellent happy hour! 3-6 and a really nice selection of moderately priced food. The thing I enjoyed most was the selection. Normally, with a happy hour at a bar and grill, you get basic bar food. But their happy hour menu includes full meals...like a cheeseburger for only $5.95.  Came in with a party of 5 for drinks and snacks, and ended up ordering 6 or 7 different appetizers. Everything was good, but I really enjoyed the nachos! You won't be disappointed. Only reason for 4 stars rather than 5 was the prices on the beer. Though they have an impressive selection of beers on tap, only a small number were included in the happy hour specials, and those were still $4.50 (I think). To be honest, I'm not certain how much I paid for the beers I did have, but for a couple appetizers and a few beers, I didn't feel like I got an amazing deal. The good news is, the food was all really good, the beer was COLD, which I appreciate, the decor was nice. All in all, a great new place. Will definitely be back!

lGCH-wgoFeLLR7FF8mARyQ.text: If I come into Hop Social better believe I'm looking for Angel or Cooper. My husband and I always come here after our shifts to have a good time and get some great cocktails. These two know how to keep it entertaining and I can't imagine coming to the bar without them behind it. Also you can't beat the happy hour just about tried everything but always go back to the steakbites

UDqUnjce9a_OYRKvIW9V1g.text: Went in Saturday night at 6pm with a party of eight.  The restaurant was busy but we sat on time.  We ordered drinks and appetizers.  The appetizers were delicious especially the calamari.   I had a Bloody Mary that had no alcohol that I could taste.  Also my second Bloody Mary tasted better but they forgot to put green olives on it.  The food we ordered was very good for the money,  I would give five stars.  However, slow service and warm restaurant, cost the review.  I will definite return and give them another chance.

eQ_WqVkhPGjmiYDyhWeZkA.text: Love this place! JJ my neighbor great cook love the set up the donuts the corn fritters need to go try more in the menu worth driving to Chandler

0ME1FA2RXkEAfyqsmqJM5Q.text: On a work trip and been here two nights in a row now. I'll start with the service, second to none! Angel at the bar is awesome and will watch over everything to make sure it's perfect and if you're lucky she'll remember your name :) Food is great and the atmosphere is perfect. I would recommend!

q2gG76g7ThsfqH9CMQ1v0w.text: Great food and presentation for a sports bar.  They remodeled the former elephant bar and opened it up to make it very light and open.  The food was delicious the noise level was high but because of the nature of the place, expected.

G8SHFnXt1AbGSs9G3ZeoSA.text: The food and beer choices are pretty good, it's the long wait even when there are few patrons and plenty of staff standing around that is the deal killer.  I had one good experience with service/food and three bad ones with what we can call no service instead of slow service; where we sat twenty minutes and eventually left without so much as ordering a drink due to the slow service as staff mingled.

28og1zdRtBe9y688v1MrgQ.text: We went to Hop Social on a Friday for happy hour. We grabbed a table outside. Service was good and there were many beers to choose from. We got fish tacos, mac n cheese, and poutine. Food was good, but nothing that jumped out as "I gotta go back and have that again!".   My two complaints were 1) the seating set-up outside - it felt really cramped. We had a table with one side against the outside wall (with a bench) and the other side with a chair, towards the walkway. Every time the server for the table behind us would walk by... my chair was bumped. I couldn't possibly move it in any closer to the table. And 2) the happy hour beer selection was really confusing - there was no list. The happy hour menu just says "select craft beers". When asked for a listing, I swear that the two different servers told us different beers (they changed shift while we were there). Would be nice to have them listed!   But, on the plus side... the food was good. The service was good.

KJvBK2Gq6WYZoBe9YRmq2A.text: What a great place! Very enjoyable lunch, went shopping at Chandler Fashion Square and then went for lunch at Hop Social Tavern.  I had the Kung Pao Chicken and Ashley a Bahn Mi sandwich.  We both loved our food and the drink was good as well.  Desert Dragon cider for Ashley and an Amber Ale for me.  We'll go here again!

QeqVcaVVvKJwXg7_iNMHnQ.text: Me and my family ate at Hop Social Tavern for the first time this week and we will definitely be coming back! From the service to the food, we could not have asked for a better experience. Our server, Carlie, was incredibly friendly and very helpful whenever we needed anything! She was willing to go the extra distance to make sure we had everything we needed. The food was delicious and there were great beer options. Excited to return back!

hfWR-AhgdEFt9JZ6Ss7u-g.text: I've never ordered a drink or entree I didn't love!   If you're a veggie burger lover, you'll be surprised at the reddish color. I think it's the beets. My daughter and I will no longer eat veggie burgers anywhere else cuz Hop Social has spoiled us.   If you like fries, theirs are good. We ask for their special garlic burger topping to dip them in.    We've been numerous times over the past year.  Service is always great.  Staff is friendly!  If you are in the area, this has got to be your best choice.

BiFU436f1FLg0GnDlJ_efA.text: Love this place already after one visit. It's in a nice location, and the setup is perfect. Plenty of space and not crowded by tables and chair to fit a ton of people. The beer selection was perfect with many choices. The service was professional and helpful. The food was amazing. I had the BBQ Bacon Burger which was cooked perfectly and full of flavor. My girlfriend had the Chicken Pot Pie which was huge, steamy, and full of flavor. Definitely something I'll order next time. But their menu had a lot of great choices when it comes to food. This will be our new spot where we will become norms.

SKDPMF_I94-y8AI8-2pdPA.text: This place earned a scar as the most ridiculous service I've ever experienced. The waiter was rude from the start, and dumped a flight of beers on the table and all over my date. Soaked her clothes, left us sitting in puddles for about 10 minutes, and only gave us napkins to soak up his mess after my third request. Didn't even replace any of the beers he spilled. We remained friendly through all of this because we'd had an otherwise awesome day. Our steaks were basic and not cooked properly. But the craziest part of dinner was the manager coming over and embarrassing my date when she ordered a porter for desert. My date had had only two beers, and the request for the porter provoked an embarrassing and pretentious response from the manager as she scolded us loudly for violating their 4 drink maximum rule. I tried over and over to explain that we hadn't "violated" the rule to begin with, but the she wasn't actively listening. Terrible place, terrible employees, and basic food.

5kuvQRRP_5TqCOJLQXm0yA.text: Great spot!! Nice and centrally located.... Great for date night or happy hour. Great food and great drinks!

5chLNRzCIvG5DodBl3h_1g.text: I LOVE this place. My boyfriend and I love to come here for happy hour as they have great deals and their happy hour food menu is one of the best I've come across. The prices are great and the food portions are actually a good size whereas normally the happy hour portions are small. We've always had great customer service and a good experience every time we come here!

tienweleGYG4uWjuSPeVTw.text: First time visiting snd it's someplace I can see hanging out occasionally. Didn't get waiters name bc no introduction. Didn't get the "first time" menu/drink recommendation spiel. I like a waitstaff that can pique my interest in something other than burger n fries. Food and drink order arrived quickly AND hot (kudos). Overall I loved the layout, the beer selection and happy hour!!

-Y-rtH7Exm6qBJdCv6feGA.text: I really enjoyed my stay last Friday at Hop social Tavern. Love all the tap handles on the left as you enter the fun cool vibe of an establishment. Wish I could have stayed longer and met some friends but I was there for a quick business lunch. The staff were friendly, fun and knowledgeable. It was great seeing the GM be a team player and help out his staff as a single unit.   I had the Ahi Tuna Poke for lunch. I call it the Leaning Tower of Poke.  It wasn't leaning, it just looked really cool and very appealing. Artistic! Amazing presentation and fantastic taste with a nice crunch. It needed a little more soy sauce and lemon for my needs. I would definitely order it again.

ZQpcc-zFl8r3dw69HQkJqQ.text: Not a bad place to go. I went just recently for the first time after the little hype that I've heard.  First impression - the inside decor was badass. From the beer selection decor to the sweet modern couches. The look overall is great.   Its right by the mall, which is a great location. I think this place will do well because of that alone.   I ordered a burger. My friends ordered Chicken Marsala and Fish Tacos. Everyone seems to think their food was Ok. I don't think it was FANTASTIC, but I may have just ordered the wrong them for my liking.   Customer service was great. Everyone seemed genuinely nice and happy to be there. There is a pretty sweet bar area, which I thought looked cool as well.   I hear that the desert here is awesome. For that reason alone, I'll probably be back to try this place again. I may even order something different and try and get this place up to 4 or 5 stars!   Customer service 5/5 Restaurant cleanliness 5/5 Location 4/5 (because of the traffic) Food 3/5 Value overall 3/5

vCm9GbHoeyZrUe95Zv-uEw.text: This was our first visit and there were a number of positive aspects that helped them earn four stars. First off, we were greeted with a warm welcome at the door when we arrived and our table of five was immediately seated. The dining area is quite spacious with interesting couch-like seating in one area and counter-height booths in another. We tried the donut appetizer and OMG...so good! Don't be scared away by the reference to ricotta cheese, which sounds like an odd ingredient addition to a donut. They really are wonderful and frankly were probably the best part of the meal! The food was good but it I'd say it wasn't anything special (the donuts were special). The pastrami on the pretzel roll could have been but it needed some seasoning/some flavor. My hubby said the same about the meatloaf - just needed some seasoning. Our waitress was quite friendly, attentive, and efficient. All in all a good experience. We'd certainly give them another try.

Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

4TOnCJIsB5DYiUlqdIVLuA.text: A very mediocre spot in my opinion.    Atmosphere is great, love the open kitchen, but everything else could be better.    Hostess right from the start had a b*tchy attitude towards my wife.    I ordered the Citrazona which was luke warm, and my wife a vodka soda with a splash of pineapple which tasted more like a double shot.    For dinner we ordered the pizza and salad; pizza was a 4 out of 10, the salad we ended up cancelling because it didn't arrive until our pizza was finished.  I'll give this place one more try but this time going in w/ low to no expectations.

OZk9zPadzJ87k6SJEP8FQg.text: The bartender with the dark hair is really cool. This spot has become a regular for my man and I. The drinks are good and so is the atmosphere.

cs5sSH14l2a7-qDorZ9okQ.text: Went to Hop Social today for the first time for happy hour. The happy hour menu was not too expensive for the items that were on it. Unfortunately I was not able to substitute the cheeseburger on the happy hour menu for a veggie burger, but the veggie burger was still good. The bun sizes were out of proportion, which was a slight let down. I ordered an appetizer which thankfully came out as an appetizer and not with the meal, but the waiting time for our food was a little too long. Other than that the service was great! Had a bunch of different beer options and lots of different kinds of foods.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States

0CA5bpj-nwcw6-6wjHJ_ag.text: Sat at the bar for lunch.  I was torn between the chicken Marsala and the chicken pot pie.  Pot pie won.  I ordered with a side of shredded cheese because cheese makes everything better.  The serving was much bigger than I expected compared to the photos I saw.   The chicken was very tender and I would definitely order this again.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Ummm, cheese
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Had to bust in!
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. I would estimate it&#39;s in a 8 inch wide dish

pL_Se9I2oWQo1S9l79wmRQ.text: Great service & excellent food. Perfect for lunch, dinners or group events.  Steak salad is my go-to lunch meal. Everything we've had at Hop Social has been superb.  Staff & management makes sure your visit is accommodating.  My new favorite place in Chandler.

Ahasfrnrzp55tWR2fkBTHQ.text: My girlfriends and I enjoy coming here! Angel is the best hands down. She's always taking good care of everyone and offers the best drinks and service. I love coming here and getting to see her. Such a fun place to hang out at.

xxMErtG85vjS7_pyZAujeg.text: Such a great place! Angel is one of the BEST bartenders I've had! Great service, great food, and great drinks!

kMo4Ilg1s-yrUNTDCHQKuw.text: Chose to sit on the patio rather than wait 30 minutes for inside seating. Misters were on with a slight breeze...so it was perfect. Greeted by our server (Trevor) almost immediately who took our drink order. Tower station on tap! Wife got the blood orange mojito (delicious). Saw the tip to order the steak salad...thank you!!! Steak salad was amazing, tender steak, tangy dressing, and fried Brussels sprouts. Did the gluten free bun in the BBQ bacon cheeseburger and it was pretty darn good! I think I will be coming back during happy hour 3-6 daily. Great service, great food!

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Steak salad (halved)

2qmxaM9M57BT4hl1B0V11A.text: Been a few times & introduced others. Great service & atmosphere. Enjoyed many things..apps, burgers, fish & chips, chicken marsala but...pizza crust twice has been under cooked. Not inedible but for a pizza oven not a brown mark on it & doughy. Will continue to enjoy this spot but hope they up their pizza game.

qqcAaj9UFdUAvd370PT1ag.text: Food was great. Dessert was great. Service was too. Beer selection could use more rotational since I've had everything on their list. Utilizing untappd would be a good idea for them. There was an issue with knats but overall I'd come again. Just add more rotational beers hint hint

pysKCfPjZTgQmVLKGUA7Sg.text: Haven't been here a couple of times. Not out of the ordinary. The menu is a little underwhelming and the food is uninspired. Good service. Priced a little on the higher than average side. Too many good places to go to for me to consider going back.

e8LEzoqITZBtHeAztsoQDw.text: We had a reservation and it seems one of the four hostesses can't get our table together after 20 minutes of waiting... Also it was supposed to be a surprise bday dinner but we had to surprise her at the door:( Literally loved this place hate the hostesses! Just be prepared to wait even if u have a reservationBut don't worry they do know how to work a door

dLtlpUgDfmAutFbrgFnd5w.text: This place had tons of people, which usually bodes well, so we thought we'd stop. It's completely loud with pop music and people yelling to be heard . . . Which makes it hard to hear or be heard! Not only that, but it was so hot in there! Our party of three were all suffering. The service was completely slow - perhaps understaffed. My "Cuban" was amazingly delicious. I almost forgave the place for the hot dining area because it was so good. The other two in my party both had French dip that they both highly appreciated . . . Until they both got sick. The slow service wasn't appreciated by the three of us that would normally have had two or three times as many cocktails if they had been coming faster or if it were more comfortable in there. We won't be back.

ro66a5UngHVkgU-bdGyeVA.text: Most of the reviews for this place are people loving it.  We didn't quite have the same feeling.  We loved the Elephant Bar when it was in this location and wanted to give the new restaurant a try.  The interior has been converted  to a very open concept.  It's nice.  There are lots of high bar seats, some lower tables and booths.  There's a very modern feel.  I wasn't real pleased with the menu.  I'm not sure what we were looking for but had a little trouble ordering for a late lunch because I didn't feel we had good options.  We didn't want a hamburger and didn't want a steak.  We ended up with a pepperoni pizza.  The 12", 6 slice pizza was $14.99 and had a total of 7 pieces of pepperoni.  The pizza was very good and had lots of cheese.  Seasoning was good but it was more like a cheese pizza than a pepperoni one.  We felt the restaurant was quite expensive for what it offered.  Service was good.

qp4bb23IW22OmMy4NbDyzw.text: It's one thing to wait when a restaurant is busy but it's another to be disorganized about it. The restaurant "holds" tables for people for up to 45 minutes if the person who put their name isn't here. Meanwhile people are waiting to be seated.

QH5hJDYBO58BKRD-aC-K_w.text: We moved into the apartments across from chandler fashion mall and wanted to find a good place to drink and a good atmosphere. We looked around and decided to give them a try and actually really loved them! They helped me decide which beer I may like best and the entire staff was really cool! Our server/bartender was Angel who was AWESOME to say the least! She and the rest of the staff were really engaging. It is for sure worth the visit! Had the grilled turkey BLT and enjoyed it as well. Happy to have came and will be returning! Mentioned they had happy hour everyday even weekends which is rare so may spend a Sunday funday here. Great place!

sfllU7xKQrFmn700th5G9g.text: I happily spent all 1200 of my calories at Hop Social today and don't regret a single one. Everything was delicious! I'll get back to that in a minute. First I have to talk about the customer service, it was fantastic. So Tenley was our server she was so friendly and attentive, our drinks and food came to our table so fast.  Our dinner entrees came out before our appetizer,  Tenley profusely apologized, the manager brought out our appetizer and apologized, it was comped by the manager, the tiny booboo was handled so professionally I didn't feel slighted in the least. Actually it worked out to my benefit, I took my pretzel dipped it in beer cheese then dipped it in my Chicken Pot Pie, dipped in beer cheese dipped in meatloaf, dipped in beer cheese dipped in mash potatoes, dipped in beer cheese dipped in Mojito, just kidding but I did a lot of double dipping. YUMMMM   Beer selection was huge I took sips of several but ended up with some traditional but equally well made tasty mojitos.   I ordered the Chicken Pot Pie which came out so hot, and tasted great just like moms. The meatloaf and mash potatoes were delicious and also tasted great just like moms. OH! And last but not least DONUT BALLS with Carmel Sauce! Crunchy crispy sweet cinnamony little nummies, not like moms she didn't let us eat donuts.

q7h3s-l_-GoX8zaq1zQYGQ.text: You can see in my previous review I'm not a fan of their happy hour.  I'm still not.  I stopped by for dinner with some friends and decided to get there just before happy hour ended to grab a drink before dinner.  Still, they have 40+ beers on tap, still only a handful are on happy hour, still the bartender isn't really sure which ones, and for the 2nd trip in a row, I received a different beer than what I ordered.  I can't recall this happening to me anywhere else and it's happened here twice.  2-stars for the bar.  Onward to dinner...  Needless to say with my happy hour experience I wasn't going into dinner with super high expectations.  That said, the service was excellent and attentive (she even got the drink's right!) and the food was quite good.  I went with the Cuban which was great.  It had lots of shaved ham and pulled pork and was very ample in size.  The fried chicken was also good. It's enough to feed two people if you're looking to split a dish.  It's two large chicken cutlets fried with mashed potatoes.  Additionally the donuts for dessert were a good way to end the meal.  The atmosphere on a Friday night was great and the 45 minute wait we were quoted seemed to go quickly.  For dinner, I'll be back.  For happy hour...well, we've covered that.

aV_1KuBASafGTU__yMtijA.text: This is my go-to restaurant whenever we have out-of-towners with us and sometimes just because. The food is fantastic, the atmosphere is fun and cool, and the service are super friendly. We have enjoyed every experience that we have gone there. It's hard in Chandler to go back to restaurants because there are so many cool new options. That being said, we have been to this restaurant probably about six times in the last three months.

fZ2COa8YoPQgpr7d34v2Wg.text: I enjoyed my time here with great drinks and really good drinks. I will definitely  return just hope they get a hold on their fruit fly situation. It was the worst I have ever seen. Encourage their staff when changing yo evening crew to communicate  that info! Otherwise their food made up for the 2 negatives, chicken pot pie was amazing!

wFJmFmJ3sNu5H-RQsTigAw.text: Despite the beautiful dining area and the wonderful first impression, the service, food, and treatment I received on my first time at this establishment was very much sub par. After ordering, the server accidentally gave us the food from the table next door which they immediately corrected, apologized, and offered them soup or salad as they wait for a fresh plate of what they ordered. Noticing this interaction in comparison to the treatment we later received made this entire experience much more disappointing. Our calamari appetizer came late, at the same time as our entrees, and lukewarm. In addition, my parents both ordered fish and chips which was mistaken for fish tacos by the server. Instead of immediately correcting the mistake, the server awkwardly took the food away and went back to check if that was in fact what we ordered and what he wrote down. He eventually returned and said the food would be coming soon with no apology or concern, as if we were the ones at fault for the mistake. A huge contrast compared to the service of the next door table. I'm not sure if it was due to the fact that these next door guests were predominately white males while our table was predominately females in which case they potentially did not feel the need to address our issues with the same promptness or kindness or our server was inexperienced (although the server was exactly the same for both tables, so he may just have issues treating guests consistently or equally). Food came around 20 minutes later after half the guests finished their meals. Overall the food was rather salty except for the mashed potatoes (despite the service I admit that these were well made). The hostess eventually came around to make a very brief apology, which left us feeling more confused and dissatisfied because it did not seem that they appreciated our patronage as new customers. After we received the check the server finally addressed the problem and asked if we wanted donuts on the house for the mess up. At this point we were so fed up with the food and service that we graciously declined to continue this experience. I left this distasteful place feeling as though I had done something to wrong them and not the other way around. My apologies for not ordering what you had wanted me to and inconveniencing you. On a different note, thank you for ruining my mother's birthday.

m469gAoLMVJO5IFNtfz_7Q.text: Loved this pub!  The food was excellent and they had s large beer selection. Much recommended.

D35jY9eK0rNNKIrFxhY1xA.text: The food is good. The beer and drink selection is excellent. Service could improve. I am unsure if our server had a huge section, but she wasn't over too often. It was a Saturday during lunch, but it wasn't crowded. There was no wait and we were sat right away. The food did come out in a timely manner once the order was placed. I'm not trying to be overly critical, since the overall experience was good. I just wish we were checked on more frequently. I would have liked my beers a little faster and have not sat empty for so long.

photos.caption: Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and cheese
Photo of Hop Social Tavern - Chandler, AZ, United States. Bourbon onion burger

WcWMlgKKd2dCCj-wXTzLiQ.text: Visited again tonight and it was busy!  Jonathon handled the pressure very well.  Meatloaf was great and hubs had the buttermilk chicken.  Papago Coco Joe and 12 West IPA rounded it out.  Delicious.

kvvLrgvHTKJLresUnR0-yw.text: The Bartender Angel and Levi were AMAZING!!!   My friend Val kept raving about not only the food but this girls amazing service and I have to say, I was NOT disappointed! Drinks came quickly and she knew exactly what I wanted without me having to say much! My food hasn't even came yet and I'm already happy! I'd recommend this place from my first impressions

p9wOKveBEIqSzGWcOM1z7Q.text: Met a couple of friends for lunch today. I usually have very good service, but not the case today. Sara only came back once to see if we needed anything. We sat there for about an hour with empty drink glasses. We were all parched. Just as we were leaving she asked if we wanted more. Really? I made the comment that we could have used some a half hour ago. Food was very good as usual. I tried the banh mi sandwich with coleslaw. I love their coleslaw. The sandwich was very tasty and the bread fresh. It had a nice kick so it's a good thing I asked for no jalapenos. We were never asked if we wanted dessert so I didn't try anything. I was so thirsty by the time we left I just wanted to get out of there.

8VJ3yVbjQY4IYFdBiBM2Ig.text: We visited once last year and the food quality was very good but the service was terrible. Fast forward to our visit last night, what a delightful change, Brandon, our server was stellar and the food was once again excellent. We will definitely be back sooner!! Thanks to the management team for tightening up the service issues and maintaining the food quality, special thanks to the back of the house, your food rocks!

_5niGM6JpnUkejAImO17AQ.text: This is my second visit to hop social. My girlfriend decided to spend her birthday here with me and we sat at the bar with the best bartender, Angel. She has great recommendations for drinks and each one surprised us with how good it was. All in all it was great food, good fun, and an even better atmosphere.

Sn2gW-Jit8W9g-BbMlBN-g.text: Some Staff were rude, confused, heard it's a great place from a few different people, may try again.

2ykKjI2qfqGc3HiMCOG_aw.text: Totally our kind of place. Reasonably-priced. Tons of option (pizza, kung pao chicken, burgers) and fairly normal food (no fru fru stuff.) The fresh-baked cookie for dessert was really good, although could have filled the pan and bit a bit more chocolatey. Really friendly group too.

VeY_V63yyiJaSCNvFJLwOw.text: This place is very chill and has a great happy hour with a strong menu and solid drinks. I like the price of the beer flights and love the donut balls they have on the menu..

nd9dk77Y8MS8g-_YlLH-mw.text: A friendly crew and good food.  The menu has a lot to offer and will bring me back.  I stopped in for a quick salad to go and very much enjoyed my strawberry/pear and apple salad.  The Elephant Bar had been a location of choice for me for a long time but this new concept and food selection will keep me returning to a familiar address.  The staff and management seem to work well together and together they offer a great experience to the customer.

sRj_6e4W5YkvtnvHzBsejw.text: My favorite newer place in Chandler.  Great beer selection and cocktails. Friendly staff, Cari is our favorite server, and excellent atmosphere.  Great food comes with a great diverse menu and pricing is in line with BJ's or Cheesecake Factory in the area.

U7Dm3GZj_4wBfABkHOPNuQ.text: Im a fan! Tons of beer options and consistently good food with diverse options. Definitely worth checking out

ytWVcJdrrti-iijgf9LIKA.text: Delicious Bison Burger, Lots of choices on the food and beverage menu.  Great opportunity to watch sports or people...enjoyed some time on the patio.  Ambiance music is complimentary to all ages! The staff are very attentive and friendly. I will definitely return!!

0RZDszdvWzLSlNl5u4HEPA.text: This place has a great Happy Hour. Very good food and a great service. Stop by on a Sunday afternoon when it's not crowded.

TBnTQcAyd00gFkfzFSGhnw.text: Good Craft beer selection and a killer happy hour. Cheap and inventive. Wait staff is very friendly.

ZKFfHxW0iV2HjoKNlYdYsg.text: The food is super super tasty! And the service is well attend . I recommend the bison burger is my fav !!

Ac9TtNSBCVCk7lWl7kmlAg.text: This establishment was only ok. We sat at the bar and there were so many bartenders that we couldn't simply enjoy our drinks before someone was "checking in" with us. Definitely the opposite issue of many places. The many beers on tap are mostly Arizona breweries. The food was good, but nothing special to report. We will it make an effort to return.

46Kkf-YzxNNhF5ql4A0Pdw.text: I came here with some friends and we had a great time although it was a little bit loud the place was clean the service was good and the options they have fit everyone's pallet. Since it is very close to our home we will definitely be back. Happy a place like this open in the neighborhood

208IcKKCm_5ysgX30LJKDw.text: So this is our 4th time here and once again they nailed it.  The service is spot on, management comes around to check on us to see if we are doing ok.   The decor is fresh, relaxing and  has some funky cool lighting fixtures.  The food is yummy and have never been disappointed,  personal recommendation is the meat loaf, it's better then mom's. The beer selection has several varieties and they have chosen some really good brews.

Cp3qmZL3y0pLQUJx2tPy5w.text: To the management - The front of house hosts do not know how to do their job. They have one person that stays up front and another that takes you to the table. We had reservations at 6:45pm and as we waited for our table for 10 minutes, we observed the chaos. Groups of people came in and they started to tell people it was an hour wait and then they started to say it was 1.5 hour wait.  I saw them turn away several people.  When we finally sat down, we noticed several tables open up so the groups of people that just came in were able to sit down right away. The one gal that seats guests should observe what tables are opening up and communicate that to the front host. I've never seen a dysfunctional operation as this restaurant. So the takeaway is, it's all about timing. If you come in and they say it's an hour wait, just wait, it's not an hour. They have no idea what they are doing. Or come back in 10 min and they will give you a different waiting time. Food is pretty good though so definitely go in and they have a good list of craft beers.

MNaoJ2EtUztGwKfMpTcGdA.text: Such a great place to celebrate a birthday!! Between the food and drinks you can't pass it up. Shout out to Angel who made the night special. We will most definitely be back!!
