8xxtzvaP39FMNvVXmio3gA.text: Love this place! Good food, friendly staff, awesome beer selection. The pot pie is the owner's family recipe. The steak salad is amazing!

Q0aN80nOaiUp5ZQ3OfvkSA.text: Great diverse menu. Something for everyone. I've had 4-5 dishes over the past 6 weeks and they were good. Serving sizes good, as well. We like the environment and the patio is nice. Serving staff is hit or miss. We didn't have any drinks from the bar so I cannot comment on those. Give it a try!

sQnmENwvmpU1VFh39Slkyg.text: Service, amazing! Food, amazing! Atmosphere, amazing! Found the best French dip in the valley and the ribs were fall off the bone, delicious! Go to this restaurant, you will not be disappointed!

HhfaxKGBwhYdnlkjNOpcQw.text: Came here for Father's Day 2018 with my dad and boyfriend. We got sat down right away. Our server brought most of our things to us in a timely manner but There are two reason why they didn't get 5 stars and that's because a few little things that matter while in a restaurant. He forgot our waters and didn't bring them out til we almost left, and we asked for ranch for our fries and they brought out some sort of horse radish sauce which tasted NOTHING like ranch but really besides all that, this place was great. The beer selection, the food and the people were pretty great.

yjgHcDVfJKNMtU-5d9lf0Q.text: Buttermilk chicken tenders are amazing. You can cut them with a fork; juicy & delicious! Sat at bar, Angel was great! First time here and it was very good

pVY8jCXP7f9ELNGOoogvqA.text: I own several successful businesses, and we dine out 6 days a week. I dine at Maestros, Binkley's, Ocean Club, City Hall, Season 52, Shin Bay, Dominick's, Capital Grill, Steak 44, Flemming's, etc, on a regular basis...but I have never seen a business and/or restaurant ran like this place. Staffed by millenials that conduct themselves like doormen at a night club...you are greeted by a daddy's little rich girl, who daddy put in charge of his restaurant, and the princess hired all of her condescending club rat friends. All the Californians and/or New Yorkers will relate to this restaurants business model...Although the place has numerous open tables and is half empty, you will be not seated, but instead you will be directed to the bar. In other words...the place is short staffed because no one wants to work there and there is a 1,000% margin in alcohol and you only need one bartender. The food...how can I put this...lets just say that Chef Gordon Ramsey would close the place down, sent everyone home, and start yelling swear laced insults at the cooking staff.

Uhk-wJG1lQMTVXEWuVo2Mw.text: Decided to wander back to this close to home restaurant for happy hour. It was busy, but I found a spot at the bar. Had a cheeseburger and wine. All good. Now for the bartenders. I have never seen a lazier, more disinterested bartender than the young man serving me tonight. Luckily, he had a female co-worker that was easily handling 90+% of the work, including serving most of the guests at the bar and handling all of the drinks from the restaurants. She did it all with a smile and great spirits. I wish that I got her name--long black hair. The male bartender has been working here for awhile (surprisingly). I've had his lack of service before. It's not just that he is lazy, he is completely disinterested. He points at you to take an order. You need to yell out everything you want all at once or he'll disappear and you may get your drink, but not your food. Hop needs to rid themselves of this disinterested problem at your bar or you may lose the great bartender that has to make up for him. Several of us at the bar were discussing the obvious disparity in their workload. This would be a 4-5 star review without this service problem.

feva3VqLFaOl7FLMmmTduA.text: Great new place. Super well designed space, indoor and outdoor bar. Ample seating and a ton of beer on tap.  This should do well.

e_yb51DV0m5XE5DRz6Qr_A.text: Wonderful service, Avery was a great server! The food was amazing! I'm glad this place opened  perfect spot to spend a Sunday. We had the Brussels sprouts and the Social pizza, both great choices!

Vlhbys8UsEnBZvZDsC3NWw.text: Love this place!! Just opened and it's awesome! They have a great happy hour and ambiance is perfect. The owner Dave came and talked to us for awhile. Super guy! I'm very impressed! We'll be back.

1twoGAd-M2L7PdH6dBGGeA.text: Amazing food and great beer selection!! David (owner) came by our table to check on everything, he was very personable and this place is his passion. Our server was Christina (Miss Wanderlust) was very good and we HIGHLY recommend the donuts for desert. We will be regulars:) Great concept!!

rxOwnTcmcZcA-r9Ko-94cw.text: I can't say enough great things about this place! Everything from the excellent service, amazing food, beers on tap, and great happy hour menu. We tried all kinds of things on the happy hour menu since the pricing was so great. We ordered the fish tacos, chicken tenders, California roll, truffle fries, lettuce wraps, and the donuts. Everything was delicious! So glad this place opened up close to our house, we will defiantly be back!

au1wheEq5-JeLxM2kPm9YQ.text: Love this new place!!!  Great atmosphere... indoor outdoor bar... menu was amazing with something for everyone!  Happy hour every day!  We ordered the  Bruschetta flatbread,  Steak bites, Fish tacos and dinner salad.  All of our items were fresh and amazing!  Our server Chelsea was wonderful and attentive.  We met the owner Kristine as well and she was very receptive to what it is we look for in an establishment.  Excellent place!  We will return!

H0dkEnV4BJ2A3-XtsOEJbg.text: Favorite place for happy hour! Such an impressive amount of options and so delicious! Highly recommend the steak bites, soft baked pretzels, spinach artichoke dip, and the donuts (so good!). Will definitely be coming back again.

3Iw-gW6lDyim2Ea0xiGxvg.text: Very nice owners and a very nice atmosphere! The food is great and reasonably priced! Take advantage of sitting outside in the nice weather, there is a ton of seating available!

v2zYYUacQTTs2mBL5R66Zg.text: Phenomenal tap selection, great service, delicious food! Love the decor and over all vibe of this restaurant, nice outdoor seating area too. We will be back!

_ve857GP7wiOxDjPrnexXQ.text: Fun atmosphere, friendly service & good food. This is my third visit, and I will be returning again. The Thai Coconut Linguine was very tasty, the Hot Scratch Donuts are melt in your mouth yummy!

iBsZ9l_QCHI_PSHfPsIa-w.text: Great new (non chain) restaurant with a gastro pub feel, good service & solid comfort food. Portions are large, prices reasonable & the menu is varied...apps, salads, sandwiches, burgers & entrees. We had the fish & chips and fried buttermilk chicken entrees - enjoyed them immensely. Also the pear Cosmo martini was different & good. Nice vibe combined with friendly service. We will be returning.

K5XD4FO2GN44KsfX7b3ymw.text: Amazing restaurant/Bar! Incredible food selection, from comfort food to Asian to pizza to sushi. It's an amazing "mama's kitchen" meaning everything is from scratch and made from love... you can Tell! Incredible beer selection, but great wine also, which is rare! Staff is nice and attentive! This place will quickly be come the hot spot!

jKyWvjdsaBBAnbqvYa7oGw.text: I have no other way to describe this restaurant than with one word: phenomenal!!! My friend and I came in for a quick beer and bite. We didn't expect to have the best service ever (always ask for Sarah Monday - Friday, she's perfect) and to eat the most amazing food ever. Honestly, I was so happy with everything I put in my mouth. If you want the best dessert ever, try their donuts. Because dear baby Jesus, I almost cried when I took the first bite.

dWnRPilecTfeJueDetGovQ.text: Angel behind the bar is amazing !!! Great service !!! I will defiantly be back !!! Thank you girl !!! 5++

EK7LMkJSZKUcIdLthpnxzA.text: Great atmosphere, great food...and waitstaff. Love the salads. Would highly recommend. Great to have them also a member of the Chandler Chamber of Commerce! Supporting the community.

kBwpNi9rS0f9zEf09c0dYQ.text: This place has great food, really cool staff and a great place to dine and socialize.  Definitely check this place out. You'll be glad ya did.

elglssT6kmQJBuUR7f-81g.text: I went to Hop Social Tavern on opening night and have probably been there 25 times since then! This place is amazing. The service is always outstanding. The owners are so nice and truly care about every customer walking through the door. The food is also very good. The pretzels and cheese and the donuts are to die for. Also, the chicken pot pie is the best i have ever had. This place is definitely a new go-to!!!
